Ms Tham is 38 years old with one child. She is living in Dong Tien village.  Being a farmer, she focuses on growing rice and raising chickens and pigs for meat. Her business started many years ago. Participating in Seda’ credit program since 2010, she mostly used loans for her raising her chickens and pigs. She wants to have a loan of 7,392,000 Vietnam dong to buy feed for her poultry
  
 Ms Cat is 57 years old. She is a farmer and she is in need of a loan of 7,392,000 Vietnam dong to buy food for her pigs.

loans.use: to buy poultry feed

loans.name: Sylvia

texts.en:
Sylvia is 28 years old and married. They have two children. She has been running a used clothing sales business for the last seven years earning a monthly income of KES 10,000.

She is requesting her first loan with KADET Ltd of KES 30,000. She will use the loan to purchase additional stocks of trousers, shirts,T-shirts and tracksuits. With the anticipated profits, she will educate her children.

Her hopes and dreams are to start another business and educate her children.

loans.use: To buy trousers, tracksuits, skirts and T-shirts to sell

loans.name: Adriana Isabel

texts.es: Adriana Isabel es una joven emprendedora que siempre ha querido ayudar a sus padres, por lo que ha buscado la manera de generar sus propios ingresos y así ha logrado alivianar la carga económica para sus ellos. Adriana a sus 21 años trabaja vendiendo mercancía como zapatos, blusas, accesorios, entre otros productos a sus familiares, amigos y personas del sector de su residencia. Sus ingresos actualmente no son muy grandes debido a que debe vender poco porque no tiene con que surtir su negocio, y su proveedor no le abre una línea de crédito por estar tan nueva en el negocio. Es por esto que Adriana busca una linea de credito que le permita surtir su negocio y poder atender pedidos pendientes que tiene con sus clientes y asi podra aumentar sus ingresos y mejorar tanto su calidad de vida como la de sus padres. Adriana sueña con tener un gran negocio, atender a muchos clientes y poder brindarle a sus padres la oportunidad de descansar y ser atendidos mejor que como viven ahora.
texts.en: Adriana Isabel is an enterprising young woman that has always wanted to help her parents.  For this reason she has looked for a way to generate her own income and help with their financial responsibilities.  At 21 years old, Adriana works selling merchandise such as shoes, blouses, accessories and other products to her family, friends and people in her neighborhood.  Her income is not a lot right now as she isn't selling a lot right now because she doesn't have enough stock.  Her supplier wouldn't open a line of credit for her because she is so new to the business.  For this reason Adriana is seeking for a loan that will allow her to stock her store and fill pending orders for her customers.  This will allow her to increase her income and improve her quality of life as well as that of her parents. Adriana dreams of having a big business, lots of customers, and being able to give her parents the chance to rest and to live better than they do now.

loans.use: purchase merchandise to fill pending orders.

loans.name: Khamisi

texts.en: Khamisi owns a retail shop in Mombasa, Kenya. He is married and has one child. He took a loan, which helped him start the business one year ago. Khamisi is applying for a loan of 40,000 Kenya shillings to purchase retail stock, e.g. bread, soap etc. The main challenges Khamisi faces are price fluctuations and some clients not paying on time. He looks forward to establishing a wholesale business. He will save the additional income from the loan.

loans.use: To purchase more retail stock such as bread, soap, etc.

loans.name: Luyen

texts.en: Ms Luyen is 35 years old with three children who are school age. She has a small restaurant that serves breakfast and lunch. Her business has operated for five years and has created good revenue for her family.  Participating in our credit program in 2010, she used loans effectively in her business. Currently, she wants to have a loan to buy more furniture for her restaurant.

loans.use: to buy more furniture for her restaurant.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is 37 years old and single. She owns and runs a retail shop and this has been her source of income for the last two years. She earns a monthly income of Kenya shillings 12,000.

She is requesting her first loan with KADET LTD, which she plans to use to buy cereals, wheat flour, sugar and cooking oil for resale in her retail shop. With the anticipated profits, she will expand her business.

Her hopes is to own a wholesale store in the future.

loans.use: to buy cereals, wheat flour, sugar and cooking oil.

loans.name: Sen

texts.en: Ms Sen is 64 years old with three children who are grown. She is running the business focusing on selling and buying scrap. This activity started five years ago and she achieves good income from this. Now, she is requiring a loan of 8,736,000 Vietnam dong to buy more scrap products for sale.

loans.use: to buy more scrap products to sell

loans.name: Isabel Cristina

texts.es: La joven Isabel Cristina a sus 22 años de edad es una emprendedora quien decide independizarse e iniciar su propio salón de belleza luego de haber trabajado por año y medio en una peluquería de un familiar. Esta idea surgió con el ánimo de tener sus propios clientes y apoyar económicamente a sus padres quienes son adultos de avanzada edad. Con el fin de mejorar su servicio y surtir mejor su negocio el cual tiene un mes de funcionamiento, la joven Isabel Cristina necesita de la compra de productos para la belleza y a futuro cumplir su sueño de ampliar su negocio y generar empleos directos.
texts.en: Isabel Cristina, 22, is an entrepreneur who decided to become independent and open her own beauty salon after having worked for a year and a half in a relative’s barber shop.  This idea arose because she wanted to have her own customers and help her parents, who are senior citizens, economically.  In order to improve service and better stock her business which has been in operation for a month, Isabel Cristina needs to buy beauty supplies and in the future reach her dream of expanding the business and generating direct employment.

loans.use: to buy beauty supplies.

loans.name: Huyen

texts.en: Ms Huyen is 28 years old with two children who are small. She is running a construction materials shop selling products such as bathroom equipment, water pipes, etc. Her shop started five years and she earns 7,000,000 Vietnam dong per month from this business. Joining our credit program in 2010, she finds that this kind of credit is very suitable for her business.  For this new loan, she wants 8,736,000 Vietnam dong to buy more construction products to meet the demands of her customers.

loans.use: to buy more construction products to sell

loans.name: Luis Bernardo

texts.es: El señor Luis Bernardo se ha caracterizado por ser una persona demasiado pujante en la vida, donde le ha tocado trabajar muy duro para conseguir su propio sustento y el de sus padres. Luis Bernardo se dedica al alquiler de equipos de construcción como andamios, tablones, soportes, entre otros, y de esta manera se gana el dinero necesario para vivir en su residencia. Gracias a la buena reputación de sus productos en el municipio donde reside, Luis Bernardo tiene muchos pedidos por parte de sus clientes, sin embargo, Luis Bernardo no tiene la capacidad para atender todos los pedidos y se ve obligado a renunciar a alguno de ellos. Es por esto que Luis Bernardo aspira a tener un mayor inventario de sus productos en alquiler y poder así alquilar más productos a sus clientes y mejorar sus ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus padres.
texts.en: Luis Bernardo has been noted for being a very driven person in life.  He has had to work very hard to support himself and his parents.  Luis Bernardo leases out construction equipment like scaffolding, beams and supports, among others, and this is how he generates income necessary to live at home.  Thanks to the good reputation of his products in the town where he resides, Luis Bernardo has many customer orders.  However, Luis Bernardo does not have the capacity to fill all the orders he gets and sometimes has to say no to some of them.  This is why Luis Bernardo hopes to have better inventory of equipment to rent so that he can rent out more items to his customers thus improving his income and improving his and his parents’ quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise.

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es: El señor Vicente es comerciante y su esposa es cocinera. El crédito que requiere es para pagar un contrato de anticrítico, pues actualmente vive pagando un alquiler mensual. Con el anticrético, Vicente podrá tener la posibilidad de ahorrar durante el tiempo que dura el anticrético, que normalmente dos años (Anticrético es una figura legal por la cual el dueño de casa deja vivir en su casa, departamento, a una persona o familia, por un tiempo determinado y por una cantidad dinero que es entregada al principio del acuerdo, y que será devuelta al fin del contrato). Vicente es casado y tiene un hijo. Vive en alquiler en la  Ciudad de La Paz. Es la primera vez que trabaja con kiva y también con Impro.
texts.en: Vicente is a merchant and his wife’s a cook.  He needs the loan to pay for an anticrético contract because he currently lives paying monthly rent. With the anticrético, Vicente will have the opportunity of saving during the time the anticrético lasts, which is usually two years.  (Anticrético is a legal strategy whereby the owner of the house lets and individual or a family live in the house or apartment for a determined length of time and for an amount of money that’s handed over when the agreement commences and that is to be returned when the contract ends).  Vicente is married and has a son.  He lives as a renter in the city of La Paz.  This is the first time he works with Kiva and also with Impro.

loans.use: to pay for an anticrético contract to be able to live more comfortably.

loans.name: Tham

texts.en: Ms Tham is 31 years old with two small children. She is managing a small restaurant and selling soft drinks.  Her business started 10 years ago.  In 2010, she took part in Seda’s credit program. She used her loans for her restaurant.  For this new loan, she wants 8,736,000 Vietnam dong to buy  some kitchen equipment and drinks.

loans.use: to buy kitchen equipment and drinks.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is a resident of Mombasa, Kenya. She is married and runs a food café which has been in operation for five years. She started the business from personal savings. Judith learned of Milango from friends. 
Judith is applying for a loan of 80,000 Kenya shillings to renovate the business premises. Her future ambition is to open another cafeteria. The main challenges she faces are price fluctuations and the high cost of purchasing equipment/stock.  Judith will use the additional income from this loan to purchase a water tank for the business.

loans.use: To renovate the business premises

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna is 45 years old, married and blessed with two sons who are already working. She runs a cosmetics shop and she has been in business for 6 years and right now her monthly income from the business is Kshs 35,000.

She is borrowing her first loan with KADET LTD in the amount of Kshs 30,000 which she intends to use to purchase more stock for her business. Some of the items she plans to restock include hair oils, skin lotions and nail polish. She plans to do farming with the anticipated profit from the business.

loans.use: To add stock to the business.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es: El señor Jaime es costurero. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de materia prima, especialmente telas, forros hilos y cierres para su negocio. Jaime  es soltero y tiene un  hijo. Vive en casa de su hermana ubicada en la zona de Tembladerani de la Ciudad de La Paz. Es la primera vez que trabaja junto a kiva y también la primera vez que solicita un crédito en Impro.
texts.en: Jaime is a tailor.  He needs the loan to buy raw materials, especially fabric, lining and zippers for his business.  Jaime is single and has a son.  He lives in his sister’s house located in the city of La Paz’s Tembladerani zone.  This is the first time he’s worked with Kiva and also the first time he’s requested a loan from Impro.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Ricardo Leon

texts.es: Agradecimiento es lo que mas siente Ricardo Leon hacia su madre, y es con el objetivo de mejorarle su calidad de vida que Ricardo Leon se esfuerza fuertemente todos los días en el negocio que tiene en su municipio. Ricardo León afirma que para el la felicidad es tener a su mama viviendo en mejores condiciones de las que vive hoy, por lo que nunca se cansara de buscar mayores ingresos para su negocio, es por esto que sueña con tener mas surtido en su tienda y atraer así a mas clientes, de modo que se aumenten sus ingresos y mejore la calidad de vida de su madre y la suya.
texts.en: Gratitude is what Ricardo León feels toward his mother and it’s with the objective of improving her quality of life that Ricardo León works hard every day in the business he has in his town.  Ricardo León states that for him, happiness is having his mother live in better conditions than her current ones so he never tires of striving toward higher income for his business.  This is why he dreams whit having his store better stocked and to attract more customers so that income will increase thus improving his and his mother’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Dorcas

texts.en:
Dorcas lives in Mombasa, Kenya. She is married and owns a second hand clothes business, which she has been running for six years. Dorcas learned of Milango from an employee. She used to move around with the products looking for clients prior to setting up a stall. This made her quite exhausted by the end of each day.

Dorcas is applying for a loan of 20,000 Kenya shillings to purchase second hand clothes. She looks forward to owning a ‘free market’ in the future. The setbacks the business faces are price fluctuations, some customers not paying on time and the seasonality of the business. During low seasons, there are few sales.

loans.use: To purchase second hand clothes.

loans.name: Milene

texts.es: La señora Milene se dedica a la venta de comida junto a su  cónyuge el señor José quien le ayuda por las noches, son personas muy trabajadoras. La señora se dedica a la producción y venta de comidas hace ya bastante tiempo, actualmente vende cena en la acera  en las afueras de su casa, su esposo trabaja como soldador en una empresa, y en sus momentos libres colabora con su esposa, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra  de una cocina mas grande  y su equipo de música y así  brindara mejor atención y comodidad a sus clientes. La cliente agradeció a  la institución por la rapidez con la que se le atendió y por la oportunidad que le brindan, su deseo de la Sra. es poder tener su propio restaurante para así poder brindar una mejor atención a sus cliente.
texts.en: Milene sells food alongside her spouse, José, who helps her in the evenings; they are very hardworking people.  She has been preparing and selling food for quite some time now currently selling dinners on the sidewalk outside her house.  Her husband is employed as a welder at a firm and in his free time helps out his wife.  The money from the loan is to buy a bigger stove and sound equipment to provide better service and more comfort to her customers.  She thanked the institution for the opportunity it’s given her and for the speed with which she was taken care of.  Her wish is to have her own restaurant to provide better customer service.

loans.use: to buy a stove and sound equipment.

loans.name: Jairo

texts.es: El señor Jairo ha dedicado toda su vida al trabajo en el campo, con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación pudo conseguir sus propios terrenos para la siembra de papa y fríjol con los cuales puede trabajar día a día para generar los ingresos necesarios para el sustento de su esposa y tres hijos. Actualmente, el señor Jairo necesita de la compra de insumos tales como riegos y abonos que le permitan mejorar sus cultivos puesto que el invierno los ha deteriorado mucho y reducido su productividad. A sus 45 años, el señor Jairo sueña con tener terrenos fértiles en su finca y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Jairo has dedicated his life to farming.  With much effort and dedication he managed to get his own fields to grow potatoes and beans that he’s able to work daily to generate income needed to support his wife and three children.  Currently, Jairo needs to buy supplies like sprays and manure to improve his crops because winter has deteriorated them quite a bit and reduced their productivity.  At the age of 45, Jairo dreams with having fertile fields in his farm and to improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet lives in Mombasa, Kenya. She is married and has two children. Juliet is a clothes distributor – a business she has run for three years. She received capital from her husband. Juliet learned of Kiva partner Milango from her friends and joined to access credit for her business.
Juliet is applying for a loan of 33,000 Kenyan Shillings to purchase clothes and children's shoes for resale. She would like to open a stall from where she can display her clothes. Her main challenge is some customers not paying on time. Juliet will save the extra income she makes for future use.

loans.use: to purchase clothes and children's shoes.

loans.name: Deisi

texts.es: La señora Deisi realiza labores de casa y su esposo trabaja en transporte público. El crédito que requiere es para la construcción de una habitación y el muro frontal de su domicilio . Deisi es casada y tiene dos hijos. Vive en casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona  de Tembladerani  de la Ciudad de La Paz. Es la primera vez que trabaja con kiva.
texts.en: Deisi does domestic work and her husband is employed in public transportation.  The loan she needs is to build a room and the front wall at her house.  Deisi is married and has two children.  She lives in her parents’ house in the city of La Paz’s Temladerani zone.  This is the first time she’s worked with Kiva.

loans.use: to pay to build a room and the front wall of her house.

loans.name: Josefa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Josefa, de nuevo quiere un préstamo para mejorar su negocio y surtirlo debido a la época navideña y ofrecerles variedad a sus clientes como: faldas, blusas, camisas, pantalones y podrá obtener mejores ingresos económicos.
Josefa ha tenido una buena experiencia con los financiamientos anteriores, pues le ayudaron, porque las ventas fueron mejor, ademas mejoro en sus ganancias eso le ayudo a darles lo necesario a su familia.
texts.en:
Josefa is again asking for a loan to improve her business and stock it due to the Christmas season. She wants to offer her customers variety such as skirts, blouses, shirts, and pants and in that way get better economic returns.
Josefa has had a good experience with the previous loans, since they helped her because her sales improved. In addition, her earnings improved, which helped her give her family what they needed.

loans.use: to buy skirts, blouses, shirts, and pants.

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es: La señora Claudia, se dedica a la costura de prendas de vestir femeninas, actualmente esta confeccionando blusas y vestidos, su domicilio se encuentra ubicado por el octavo anillo de la ciudad de Santa Cruz, esta viviendo en condición de anticrético. Es una excelente trabajadora y emprendedora, con el tiempo desea tener un taller de costura mas grande y poder emplear mano de obra y así comercializar sus productos en los diferentes mercados a nivel nacional ya que por ahora solo entrega a los distintos mercados de la ciudad de Santa cruz, con el dinero del crédito comprara una heladera para su uso personal y un equipo de sonido. La Sra. Claudia agradeció por el apoyo brindado y por la rapidez con la que se la atendió.
texts.en: Claudia sews women's clothing. Currently, she is putting together blouses and dresses. Her home is located in the eighth ring of the city of Santa Cruz. She is living in the condition of anticredito. She is an excellent worker and entrepreneur.  Eventually, she hopes to have a bigger sewing workshop and be able to employ a tailor and in that way market her products in the different markets at a national level. Since now, she only gives her products to the distinct markets of the city of Santa Cruz. With the money from the loan, she will buy a refrigerator for her personal use and a stereo. Claudia is thankful for the support and the speed with which she was attended.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and a stereo.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is 43 years old, married and has four children. She has been running a retail shop for the last ten years and earns a monthly income of 21,000 KES. She is requesting her fourth loan with Kiva partner KADET for 50,000 KES. She will use the loan to buy stocks of sugar, cooking oil, maize flour and soft drinks. With the anticipated profits, she will educate her children.
Susan's hopes are to be able to cater for her family.

loans.use: to buy stocks of sugar, cooking oil, maize flour and soft drinks.

loans.name: Lucy R

texts.en: Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 42-year-old Lucy from Chitungwiza. She is married with three children, all attending school. Lucy runs an agricultural business raising poultry. The business has been in operation for 10 years. She says the main challenges faced are the high mortality rate and thieves. Lucy has requested a loan of $400 to buy chicks and feeds. She says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow her to pay school fees for her children. In the future, Lucy plans to expand the chicken runs so that she can sell 3000 birds per month.

loans.use: to buy chicks and feeds

loans.name: Wiriranai

texts.en: Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 28-year-old Wiriranai from Chitungwiza. He is married with three children, one still attending school. He also cares for one dependent. Wiriranai runs a retail business of buying and selling eggs. The business has been in operation for 15 years. He says the main challenges faced are competition in pricing system and the availability of eggs during the winter season. Wiriranai has requested a loan of $500 to buy more eggs. He says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow him to  improve the welfare of his family. In the future, Wiriranai plans to own a wholesale egg market in the central business district.

loans.use: to buy more eggs for resale

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es: María, necesita de nuevo el préstamo para invertirlo en su cultivo de pipián comprando insumos y en el taller de sastrería comprando los materiales como: agujas, hilos, telas, botones de esa forma podrá obtener mejores ingresos y tener lo necesario para su negocio. Maria tuvi un efecto positivo con el préstamo anterior, pues le ayudo ya que saco mejores cosechas y tiene más clientes pudo mejorar la situación económica de su familia.
texts.en: María needs another loan, which she will invest in buying what she needs for growing squashes, and in her tailoring workshop to buy materials such as needles, tread, cloth, and buttons. In this way she will be able to increase her income and have what she needs for the business. The previous loan had a positive impact on Maria's situation, as it helped her increase her harvest and also to have more customers. In this way she was able to improve her family's economic situation.

loans.use: To buy needles, thread, cloth, buttons and things she needs for growing squashes.

loans.name: Emilia Antonia

texts.es:
La señora Emilia Antonia es casada, tiene 49 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tienen 6 hijos 2 de los cuales estudian, se dedica a la venta electrodomésticos blanca, estufa, planchas, licuadoras, lavadoras, etc. Inició este negocio siendo operaria y hasta el momento lleva 6 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para comprar mas mercaderías y mejorar sus ventas, en este caso va a compra lavadoras y entre otros productos, espera en el futuro tener un negocio grande.
texts.en:
Emilia Antonia is married. She is 49 years old. She never got the chance to study. She has six children, of which 2 are studying.  Emilia sells home appliances: stoves, irons, blenders, washing machines, etc. She started this business while she was a laborer and now she has six years’ experience.

She is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise to improve her sales. This time she wants to buy washing machines, among other products. She hopes to have a big business in the future.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Lorena Isabel

texts.es:
Lorena, necesita invertir en su tienda de productos de primera necesidad y materia prima para pupusas, por el cual nuevamente se ha decidido a obtener otro préstamo el cual le ayudara a comprar más mercadería como: arroz, frijoles, aceite, chicharon, quesillo, harina; teniendo lo que necesita podrá mejorar la atencion a sus clientes. 
Ella con los financiamientos anteriores mejoro económicamente y toda su familia vive en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Lorena needs to invest money in her basic goods store and buy ingredients to make pupusas (stuffed corn tortillas). This made her decide to request another loan with which to buy rice, beans, oil, cracklings, soft cheese and flour. With all this, she will be able to provide a better service for her customers. 
Her financial situation and her family’s living standards improved thanks to previous loans.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, oil, cracklings, soft cheese, flour.

loans.name: Oswaldo German

texts.es:
Oswaldo German tiene 39 años de estado civil Soltero, vive con el papá  y con los dos hijos, de  doce y dieciséis  años. Vive en el  Cantón Ventanas provincia los Ríos.

La ventanilla LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito , perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz, arroz fréjol y soya.

Oswaldo German se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, fréjol, arroz desde hace tres años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de abono, urea, líquidos  fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es  poder comprarse u carro para así poder vender sus productos con mayor facilidad.

Le gusta salir a jugar fútbol  y estar unida con sus hijos.
texts.en:
Oswaldo German is 39 years old and single. He lives with his father and two children of 12 and 16 years of age. He live in the canton of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos. 

The communal bank La Verdad Nos Hara Libres is located in the Caimito precinct, which is in the canton of Ventanas. This communal bank focuses on agricultural works in the short cycle planting of corn, rice, beans, and soy.  

Oswaldo German has made a living in agriculture planting corn, beans, and rice for three years. He makes his purchases in Ventanas and then makes his sales in the market located in the same place. 

The loan he requested is to buy manure, urea and liquid fertilizers to plant corn. The loan helps him to increase his income for his family's consumption and for investments. His dream is to be able to buy a car so that he can sell his products with increased ease. 

He like to go out and play soccer and be with his children.

loans.use: to buy manure, urea, and liquid fertilizers to plant corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more crates of beer for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more beans and sorghum for resale.

loans.name: Candida Del Carmen

texts.es:
Cándida, solicita un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en su negocio, aprovechando la temporada de diciembre y comprar mercadería queso, crema, cuajada y maíz de esa forma podrá mejorar en sus ingresos y podrá tener variedad para sus clientes.
Ella considera que los prestamos anteriores le ayudaron porque ella y su familia se mantiene en mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Cándida is requesting a new loan to invest in her business. She is taking advantage of the December season and buying merchandise like cheese, cream, curds, and corn. This way she can improve her income and will be able to have variety for her customers.

She believes that the previous loans helped her because she and her family have better conditions in life.

loans.use: to buy cheese, cream, curds, and corn.

loans.name: Eva Paulina

texts.es:
La señora Eva Paulina  es soltera, tiene 21 años de edad, no tuvo oportunidad de estudiar, se dedica al comercio a la venta de ropa típicas para mujeres, lleva 4 años de experiencia en este negocio.

Decide solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de mas mercaderías: blusas, cortes, delantales, suéteres, ya que quiere surtir su negocio y ampliarlo, espera en el futuro tener un negocio.
texts.en:
Eva Paulina is 21 and single. She didn't have the opportunity to go to school. She sells traditional clothing for women. She has four years experience in this business. 

She has decided to apply for a loan to purchase more merchandise, such as blouses, skirts, aprons, and sweaters. She wants to supply her business and expand it. In the future she hopes to continue having a business.

loans.use: To buy merchandise.

loans.name: Sungano Group

texts.en:
This is 24-year-old Debra from Harare. She is single with one child. She also cares for two dependents. 
Debra runs a retail business selling clothes. The business has been in operation for three years. She says the main challenge she faces is limited quantities of clothes to buy or to cross with at the border post. Debra has requested a loan of $400 to buy more clothes for resale. She says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow for the upkeep of her child. In the future Debra plans to operate from a big space in town.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale.

loans.name: Maura Yadira

texts.es:
Maura Yadira tiene 32 años  vive en unión libre tiene tres hijos. Vive con el compañero y con los trees hijos de 14- 10 y 5 años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla  LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito 1, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Maura Yadira  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace siete años. Compra y vende los productos en Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, insumos para la siembra del maíz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el bienestar de la familia. El sueño es comprar una moto.

En los tiempos libres le gusta escuchar música
texts.en:
Maura Yadira is 32, and is in a common-law relationship. She has three children. She lives with her partner, and her three children, ages 14, 10 and 5, in Ventanas canton. The  "La Verdad Nos Hará Libres" (The Truth Shall Make Us Free) communal bank is located in Recinto Caimito 1, which is part of Ventanas canton. The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, and grow corn and rice. 

Maura Yadira is a farmer, and has been growing corn for seven years. She makes her purchases and sells her products in Ventanas. 

She applied for the loan in order to buy seeds, and agricultural supplies for growing corn. The loan has helped her increase her income for her family's well-being. 

Her dream is to buy a motorcycle. In her free time, she likes to listen to music.

loans.use: To buy seeds, and agricultural supplies for growing corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bracelets, earrings, necklaces, nail polish, and makeup

loans.name: Martin Manuel

texts.es:
Martín Manuel tiene 39 años es casado y vive con su cónyuge, con los tres hijos, de 7,9 y 14 años. Vive en el Recinto Caimito en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla el LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES   se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Vicente las Lomas, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz, fréjol y soya.

Martín Manuel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz,   así también se dedica a la labor de maestro constructor.  Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, insumos, abonos para la siembra del maíz, así también para la compra de víveres y confitería para su bar. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia. Su sueño es poder gozar de una buena salud y así poder estar unidos con la familia.

En los tiempos libres me gusta trabajar en lo que sea.
texts.en:
Martín Manuel is 39 years old, married, and lives with his spouse and three children who are seven, nine and fourteen years old. He lives in the Caimito precinct in the canton of Ventanas. 

The communal bank La Verdad Nos Hará Libres is located in the San Vicente las Lomas precinct in the canton of Ventanas. This communal bank focuses on agricultural works in short cycle planting of corn, rice, beans, and soy. 

Martín Manuel makes a living planting corn. He also works as master builder. He makes both his purchases and his sales in Ventanas. He is requesting this loan to buy seeds, supplies, and fertilizers for planting corn. He will also buy supplies and pastries for his bar. 

The loan helps him to increase his income for his family's consumption. His dream is to be able to enjoy good health and in that way be able to have a united family. 

I like to work on whatever in my free time.

loans.use: to buy seeds, supplies, and fertilizers to plant corn.

loans.name: Alba Elizabeth

texts.es: Alba, solicita otro préstamo para seguir trabajando en su negocio y comprara materia prima para la elaboración de tortillas: maíz, gas, bolsas y lo utilizara para la reparación de la plancha que utiliza para su negocio, con el propósito de tener lo necesario para atender mejor a su clientela y mejorar en su produccion. Ella considera que el préstamo anterior le ayudo porque el negocio siempre es muy rentable y ha mejorado la situación económica cada día y su familia está estable.
texts.en:
Alba is requesting another loan in order to continue working in her business.  She will buy raw materials; corn, gas, and bags; to make tortillas.  She will use the loan to repair the griddle that she uses for her business.  Her objective is to have what she needs to improve service and production for her customers.

She believes that the previous loan helped her because her business is always very profitable.  It has improved her financial situation every day, and her family is stable.

loans.use: to repair the griddle and to buy corn, gas, and bags.

loans.name: Susana Teodosia

texts.es: La señora Susana esta casada con don julio y tiene tres hijos en edad escolar. Ellos viven en su casa que esta ubicada en la zona de Pampahasi central, a veinte minutos del centro de la cuidad. Ella y su esposo se dedican a la costura de deportivos en un pequeño taller que tienen instalado en su mismo domicilio, y los deportivos los hacen a pedidos para los diferentes colegios de la zona y también para los sindicatos de minibuses que tiene varios grupos.  Los deportivos que ellos realizan son hechos con tela pique como material principal, también hacen diferentes tipos de logos de acuerdo al pedido, los cuales pueden ser serigrafíado o bordados.  En esta oportunidad ellos solicitan el préstamo de dinero para el incremento de capital con la compra de rollos de tela pique ya que este material comenzará a escasear por fin de año y ellos quieren adelantarse a esto.  Susana y su esposo anhelan poder ampliar su taller de costura con la compra de una máquina bordadora.
texts.en: Susana is married to Julio and has three school-age children.  They live in their own home in the central Pampahasi area, 20 minutes from city's center.  She and her husband sew athletic wear for a living in a small workshop they set up in their own home.  They make their clothes as they are ordered by different schools in the area as well as by the minibus unions, which have several groups.  They make their athletic wear with piqué fabric as the main material and they also make different kinds of logos that can be silk-screened or embroidered, depending on the order.  At the moment, they are asking for a loan to increase their working capital to buy rolls of piqué fabric, as this material will grow scarce at the end of the year and they want to stay ahead.  Susana and her husband hope to be able to expand their sewing workshop with the purchase of an embroidery machine.

loans.use: to buy rolls of piqué fabric

loans.name: Rose

texts.fr:
Cliente de 47 ans, mariée et mère de 5 enfants dont tous son sur le banc de l'école.Ayant considérée sa charge , elle ouvre  en 2006 une boutique d'alimentation, ou elle vend les produits d'alimentation, des conserves, des cartons de lait, des cartons de savons des cartons d'eau minérale.
Cliente très ponctuelle, de bonne heure sa boutique est deja ouvert pour être au rendez vous avec ses clients.
Elle a deja beneficiee de 3 cycle de prêts, elle a remboursée avec succès et a des épargnes consistantes .
A L'octroi de son nouveau prêt, elle va renforcer le stock de ses denrées et surtout les produits que l'on achètent beaucoup comme  des conserves, de l'eau minérale, ses recettes journalières varient entre 25.000 frs a 75.000 frs par jour.
Tres entreprenante, elle veut aller loin, elle compte faire des grands efforts pour elargir son activité et prendre plusieurs fois le crédit pour atteindre ses objectifs
texts.en: The borrower is 47 years old, married, and the mother of five children who all attend school.  In 2006, after thoughtful consideration, she made the decision to open a shop where she sells grocery products, canned goods, cartons of milk, boxes of soap and mineral water.  The borrower is a very punctual woman who opens her store early in the morning to greet her customers.  She has already benefited from three loan cycles which have been successfully repaid.  She also has a large amount of savings. With this new loan she plans to increase her stock of merchandise, and will especially purchase items that are in high demand, such as canned goods and mineral water.  Her daily revenues range between 25,000 and 75,000 francs.  She is very motivated and wants to go far.  She is planning to work hard to expand her business, and to take several loans to reach her goals.

loans.use: To buy bottles of mineral water, cartons of milk, canned food, boxes of soap.

loans.name: Blanca Judith

texts.es:
Blanca Judith tiene 23 años es soltera, vive con los  padres y sus hijos de 6, 4 y 3  años en el Recinto el Caimito en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito 1 , perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Blanca Judith  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Desde hace cinco  años. Las compras y las ventas de los productos agricolas lo hace en Ventanas. 

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, insumos, fertilizantes  para la siembra del maíz,   El préstamo le ayudará para comprar los productos sin ningún problema por el dinero. El sueño  es poder comprar un terreno y así poder tener estabilidad económica   para su familia.

En los tiempos libres me gusta  arregla mi casa.
texts.en:
Blanca Judith is 23 years old and single.  She lives with her parents and her children, who are six, four, and three.  They live in the Caimito precinct in the Ventanas canton.

The “La Verdad Nos Hará Libres” (The Truth Will Make Us Free) communal bank is in the Caimito 1 precinct in the Ventanas canton.  This bank devotes itself to the short cycle farming of corn and rice.

Blanca Judith has been growing corn for five years.  She makes her purchases and sales of agricultural products in Ventanas.

She requested the loan to buy seeds, supplies, and fertilizers to grow corn.  The loan will help her buy the products without having problems due to her lack of money.  Her dream is to be able to buy a piece of land.  That way she would be able to have financial stability for her family.

In her free time she likes to fix up her house.

loans.use: to buy seeds, supplies, and fertilizers to grow corn.

loans.name: Flor Marina

texts.es: Flor, necesita fortalecer su negocio por eso solicita un nuevo préstamo el cual le ayudara para comprar más mercadería como: tomates, papas, chiles, manzanas y otros productos para la época de diciembre, ya que es el mes que más se vende y obtener mejores ganancias. El préstamo anterior le ayudo mucho a establecer su negocio y a ganar más clientes y ha podido apoyar a su familia con los gastos de la casa.
texts.en: Flor is seeking another loan to invest in her business. She wishes to buy more merchandise such as tomatoes, potatoes, chilies, apples and other items for the December season. This is the time of year when she sells the most and earns the greatest income. The previous loan helped her greatly to put the business on a firm footing, attract more customers, and pay for the family’s household expenses.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, potatoes, chilies, apples etc.

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es:
Manuel, necesita un nuevo préstamo para la recolección de su cosecha y pagar mano de obra, de esa forma podrá vender una parte de su cosecha y lo demás para el consumo de su familia.
El esta motivado con este trabajo a traves de los prestamos anteriores, ya que le ayudaron porque logro comprar los insumos agrícolas y de esa forma saco mejores cosechas este año y su familia está mejor económicamente.
texts.en:
Manuel needs a new loan for the gathering of his harvest and to pay for the manual labor. In this way he will be able to sell a portion of his harvest and use the rest for his family´s consumption. 

He is motivated in this work through the previous loans. They helped him to be able to buy agricultural supplies and in this way he had better harvests this year and his family is better off financially.

loans.use: to pay for manual labor for the gathering of the harvest.

loans.name: Jose Humberto

texts.es: José, solicita otro préstamo puesto que con la ayuda de nuestra institución le ha permitido a mover mas la producción y le facilita siempre mantener el negocio y esta vez de nuevo comprara cerdos y concentrado, de esa manera podrá mejorar su granja y a futuro serán mejor las ganancias. El préstamo anterior le ha dado un buen resultado puesto que  siempre se ha mantenido estable su negocio y ha tenido mejor solvencia económica.
texts.en: José is seeking another loan, as with help from our institution he has been able to increase production and improve his business. This time the loan money will be used to buy pigs and animal feed so that José can improve his farm and earn more money. The previous loan helped him achieve a stable business and a better financial situation.

loans.use: to buy pigs and animal feed

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is 50 years old and married with six children. She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Alma is borrowing 26,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.
Alma has been farming rice for 30 years and also earns additional income from a sari-sari store. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to buy more farmland.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Brizonia Maria

texts.es:
Brizonia María tiene 26 años vive en unión libre tiene tre shijos, vive con la pareja y con los hijos de 5-3 y 1 años de edad en el Recinto Caimito Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito 1, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Brizonia María se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra semillas, insumos, fertilizantes  para la siembra del maíz,   El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia. Su sueño  es poder comprar un terreno y así  tener estabilidad económica   para su familia.

En los tiempos libres me gusta  pasar  con toda mi familia.
texts.en:
Brizonia María is 26 years old and has a partner and three children.  She lives with her partner and her children, who are five, three, and one year old, in the Caimito Precinct of the canton of Ventanas.

The La Verdad Nos Hara Libres Communal Bank is in the Caimito Precinct, which is in the canton of Ventanas.  This communal bank deals with short-cycle farming of the crops of corn and rice.

Brizonia María grows corn and rice for a living.  She does her buying and selling in Ventanas.

She requested this loan to buy seeds, supplies, and fertilizers to plant corn.  The loan helped her increase her income for her family's consumption.  Her dream is to be able to buy a plot of land to give her family economic stability.

She likes to spend her free time with her entire family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, supplies, and fertilizers to plant corn

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es: La señora Lucia vive en la zona de Alto San Isidro que esta ubicado a veinticinco minutos del centro de la cuidad, ella esta casada con don Romualdo que trabaja como albañil constructor y juntos tienen cinco hijos de los cuales dos ya son mayores de edad y los tres menores se encuentran en edad escolar.  Lucia se dedica al tejido manual de mantas de hilo y lana de alpaca.  Estas mantas son artesanales y se venden a un buen precio pero se llega a tardar una semana en realizar una manta completa más sus flecaduras.  Lucia solicitan el préstamo de dinero para la compra de hilos y lana de alpaca para el tejido de mantas ya que tiene un pedido que entregar, su deseo más grande es poder ver a sus hijos con una profesión y personas de bien.
texts.en:
Lucia lives in the Alto San Isidro zone, which is located 25 minutes from the center of the city. She is married to Romualdo who works as a construction worker. Together they have five children, two of which are adults while the three minor children are of school age. 

Lucia makes a living hand weaving cloth and alpaca wool fabrics. These are artisan fabrics and she sells them at a good price. However, it takes her a week to make a complete piece of fabric and more for the fringe.

Lucia is requesting the loan to buy thread and alpaca wool to weave fabric as she already has an order to fulfill. Her biggest dream is to see her children have a profession and be good people.

loans.use: to buy thread and alpaca wool.

loans.name: Crisanta

texts.en:
Crisanta is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing/fish-vending business in the Philippines. She is borrowing 10,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to buy additional fishing equipment for her fishing/fish-vending business.
Crisanta has been in this business for 15 years. She earns additional income from farming rice. She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. Crisanta dreams of saving enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing equipment.

loans.name: Antonieta

texts.en:
Antonieta is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling vegetables in the Philippines. She is borrowing 29,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to buy additional vegetables to sell.
Antonieta has been in this business for 12 years. She earns additional income from farming rice. Antonieta has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling vegetables in the Philippines. She is borrowing 29,500 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to buy more stocks of vegetables.
Norma has been in this business for eight years. She earns additional income from raising livestock. Norma has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily is 45 years old and married with four children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Emily is borrowing 10,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs. Emily has been raising pigs for 25 years and also earns additional income from a sari-sari store.
Emily is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
Marlyn is 37 years old, married and has four children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Marlyn has requested a loan of 18,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to purchase additional stocks of fish to sell.
Marlyn has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of fish to sell.

loans.name: Camela

texts.en:
Camela is a widow and has a sari-sari store business in the Philippines. She works hard to support her family.
Camela has requested a loan of 21,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.
Camela has been in this business for seven years. She would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Abundia

texts.en:
Abundia is married and has a sari-sari store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 19 years. She works hard to support her family.
Abundia has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to buy more items such as soft drinks, snacks and other groceries. 
Abundia would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items such as soft drinks, snacks and other groceries.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is a widow and has a tailoring business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 8 years. She works hard to support her family.  
Alicia has requested a loan of 18,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to buy more cloth and other materials for sewing.
In the future, Alicia would like to save enough to build a dress shop.

loans.use: to buy more cloth and other materials for sewing.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is 51 years old and married with five children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Carmelita has been raising pigs for 11 years and also earns additional income from fruit vending.
Carmelita is borrowing 20,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Cherry

texts.en:
Cherry is 30 years old, married and has four children, all of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur who runs a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years. 
Cherry has requested a loan of 12,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to buy more fish to sell to customers.
In the future, Cherry would like to save enough money so she is able to continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to customers.

loans.name: Chuchi

texts.en:
Chuchi is 46 years old and married with four children. With one child in school, Chuchi works very hard to provide for her family.
Chuchi runs a variety store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 20 years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, detergent and other groceries. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to buy more items to sell and for repairs to her variety store.
In the future, Chuchi would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell and for repairs to her variety store.

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.es: Aurelia, de 37 años, es madre soltera, tiene 4 hijos. Juntos habitan en el centro poblado de Canayre del distrito de LLochegua. Aurelia, trabaja como agricultor desde los 16 años, y actualmente cultiva cacao. Nos comenta que cuando se separó de su esposo ella se quedó con los bienes de la familia, además de encargarse ella sola por el bienestar de sus hijos. Generalmente trabaja con la ayuda de peones, quienes le facilitan en el cultivo y cosecha, así solo le quedaría expenderlo a los acopiadores de cacao, siendo ellos los que trasladan sus productos desde el campo hacia su centro de acopio. Aurelia en un futuro piensa en construir una vivienda con material noble, y para ello está ahorrando. Este será su segundo credito con MFP, por lo se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Ella esta agradecida con los integrantes de su banco comunal por permitir acceder al grupo. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en el mantenimiento de su campo agrícola, por lo que contratará peones.
texts.en:
Thirty-seven-year-old Aurelia is a single mother who has four children.  They live together in the populated center of Canayre in the Llochegua District.  Aurelia has worked as a farmer for 16 years and she currently grows cacao.  She tells us that when she left her husband she got the family's assets and she was also left to take care of her children on her own.  She usually works with the help of laborers who help with the planting and harvesting; that way all she has to do is pay the cacao collectors, who are the ones who transport her products from the fields to the collection center.  

In the future, Aurelia is thinking about building a home out of fine materials and she saving up to do this.  This will be her second loan with MFP and she promises to make her payments on time.  She is thankful to the members of her communal bank for letting her join.  She will invest the 1,000 nuevos soles in maintaining her fields by hiring laborers.

loans.use: to hire laborers

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.en:
Concepcion is 56 years old and married with three children. She works hard to provide for her family. She has run a sari-sari store in the Philippines for 12 years and also earns an income from a restaurant and e-loading. Concepcion has requested a loan of 14,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to buy more items such as soft drinks, groceries, etc. to sell in her store. She has borrowed and paid back 23 loans from NWTF before this loan.
Concepcion aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items such as soft drinks, groceries, etc. to sell in her store.

loans.name: Cristita

texts.en:
Cristita is 49 years old, married and has six children, three of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 
Cristita has a food vending business selling native delicacies in the Philippines. She has requested a loan of 12,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.
Cristita has been in this business for ten years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is 48 years old and married with six children. She works hard to provide for her family. Emma runs a variety store in the Philippines and has requested a loan of 19,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.
Emma has borrowed and paid back ten loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the variety store for two years and also earns an income from food vending.
Emma aspires to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Enriquita

texts.en:
Enriquita is 49 years old and married with nine children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a loan of 18,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.
Enriquita has borrowed and paid back 18 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 11 years and also earns an income from food vending.
Enriquita aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Ignasia

texts.es: Ignacia, de nuevo necesita otro préstamo para seguir aumentando cada día en sus ventas y surtir su negocio con productos de primera necesidad como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, café instantáneos, consomé, de esa forma podrá tener más variedad y ofrecerles a sus clientes. El préstamo anterior le ayudo mucho porque lo invertio en la tienda  el cual agrego otros productos y su familia vive en  mejores  condiciones
texts.en:
Ignacia needs another loan to continue increasing her sales and stock her business with basic necessities such as: rice, beans, sugar, oil, instant coffee, consommé. This will enable her to have more variety to offer to her clients. 

Her previous loan helped her a lot because she invested in her store, in which she added more products and her family live in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, instant coffee, consommé.

loans.name: Jinky

texts.en:
Jinky is married and works hard to support her family. She has a ready-to-wear clothes retail business in the Philippines. Jinky has been in this business for two years. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP through Kiva partner NWTF to buy more items such as pants, blouses, t-shirts, curtains and other ready-to-wear clothes. 
In the future, Jinky would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items such as pants, blouses, t-shirts, curtains and other ready-to-wear clothes.

loans.name: Union Y Progreso Group

texts.es: El Banco de Emprendimiento Unión el progreso esta compuesto por nueve integrantes, La señora Lineth es la presidenta de este banco, ella vende comida tripitas en la  zona de la Ceja de el Alto, tiene tres hijos la menor tiene 3 mese y el esposo es chofer de taxi  viven en casa propia, la Sra. Lineth se levanta a tempranas horas de la mañana para elaborar su comida y para atender a sus hijos ya que después tiene que irse a la venta, es un apersona muy trabajadora se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado, su deseo de la Sra. Lineth es el de tener una tienda para ofrecer sus productos y brindar mayor comodidad a sus clientes, con el dinero del crédito comprara insumos para la elaboración de sus comida como aceite y papa por mayor.
texts.en: The Unión y Progreso Communal Bank is made up of nine members.  Lineth is the bank's president; she sells tripe dishes for a living in the Ceja del Alto area.  She has three children, the youngest of whom is three months old, and her husband is a taxi driver.  They live in their own home.  Lineth gets up early in the morning to prepare her dishes and to take care of her children, since she has to leave right after to sell her food.  She is a very hardworking person and she is happy with and thankful to the institution for the help it has given her.  Lineth's wish is to have a store where she can sell her products and make her customers more comfortable.  She will use the loan money to buy ingredients to make her dishes, such as oil and potatoes, in bulk.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make her dishes, such as oil and potatoes, in bulk

loans.name: Marta Corina

texts.es:
Marta, nuevamente solicita otro préstamo para seguir trabajando en su negocio y quiere comprar la materia prima que necesita como: el maíz y gas para la elaboración de tortillas, de esa forma incrementara sus ingresos puesto que son diarios.
Los prestamos anteriores le ayudaron porque mejoro en las ventas y tiene más clientes y a apoyado a su familia en las necesidades básicas.
texts.en:
Marta is asking for another loan to keep her business going.  She wants to buy the raw materials she needs, such as corn and gas, to make tortillas.  This way, she will increase her earnings, which can change on a day-to-day basis.

Her previous loans helped her because her sales increased, she has more customers, and she has been able to provide for her family's basic needs.

loans.use: to buy corn and gas to make tortillas

loans.name: Silvia Magdalena

texts.es: La señora Silvia,  su estado civil soltera, tiene un hijo menor de edad. La señora es nacida en la ciudad de Santa Cruz de la Sierra vive actualmente en el zona San José. Su negocio de venta de comida esta  esta ubicado en una zona comercial, ella se dedica a la venta de comida (Locro y Pollo a la Broaster) hace 3 años, trabaja de lunes a viernes de horas 17:00 a 23.00. La señora demuestra ser responsable y muy trabajadora. El crédito otorgado a la señora es para capital de trabajo (compra de insumos para su negocio como carne, leche y queso). La señora esta muy agradecida con emprender por confiar en ella y poder darle la oportunidad de hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Silvia is single and has a minor aged child. Silvia was born in Santa Cruz de la Sierra and she presently lives in the area San José. Her business of selling food is located in a commercial area. She makes a living selling food (Locro, a traditional local soup, and Broaster chicken), which she has done for the last 3 years. She works from Monday to Friday from 17:00 until 23:00. 

Silvia is responsible and very hard-working. The loan provided is for working capital (to buy staples for her business such as meat, milk and cheese). Silvia is very grateful to Emprender for trusting in her and giving her the chance to make her business grow.

loans.use: to buy meat, cheese and milk.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
La señora Mercedes de 21 años, tiene una pequeña de 1 año, ella y su esposo se encargan de cuidar de ella en su noble casa. Para poder salir adelante y superarse como familia,Mercedes decidió dedicarse a la venta de frutas desde hace ya 1 año, en el mercado en un triciclo que es suyo, en este coloca toda la variedad de frutas que tiene, ella nos comenta que tiene muchos clientes y que estos le compran buenas cantidades, ella piensa que su negocio tiene éxito porque sabe que las frutas son deliciosas y nutritivas, también es muy amable y graciosa con sus clientes, constantemente piensa en crecer y tener un negocio mucho más grande. Mercedes siempre ha querido progresar y muestra de ello es que coloco el negocio que tiene, nos comenta que compra diariamente la fruta en un mercado cercano.

Actualmente su esposo trabaja como chofer de combi, actividad que le permite juntar sus ingresos con el de su esposa y así poder tener el dinero que necesitan para su pequeña familia. Gracias a los prestatarios Kiva ella podrá comprar más de sus ricas frutas, Mercedes es una mujer alegre y siempre está sonriendo mucho, su familia es la que le da fuerza para siempre salir adelante y transmitirles también alegría a ellos.

Su sueño es poder tener un negocio mucho más grande y con esta ayuda económica poder concluir su carrera universitaria orientada a la “Química”, ella estudió 2 años y medio y no pudo continuarla debido a la falta de tiempo y dinero. Lo que más desea es poder culminar su carrera y ejercer su profesión.
texts.en:
Mercedes is 21 years old. She has a one year old daughter. Mercedes and her husband take care of her in their noble home. One year ago, in order to make progress and improve themselves as a family, Mercedes decided to sell fruit in the market from her tricycle. She puts out a variety of fruit. She tells us that she has many customers and they buy good quantities of fruit. She thinks that her business is successful because she knows fruit is delicious and nutritious. Also, she is very friendly and graceful with her customers. She is constantly thinking about growing the business and having a much larger business. Mercedes always wanted to progress and this is demonstrated by the business she has. She says that she buys fruit daily from a nearby market. 

Currently her husband works as a van driver. His work allows him to join his earnings with those of his wife. With these earnings, they have the money needed for their small family. Thanks to the Kiva lenders, she can purchase more delicious fruits. Mercedes is a very happy woman and she is always smiling a lot. Her family gives her strength in order to always make progress and to pass on happiness to others. 

Her dream is to be able to have a much larger business. With this economic help, she can finish her university degree in chemistry. She has studied two and a half years but could not continue because of a lack of time and money. What she most desires is to finish her degree and practice her profession.

loans.use: buy enough fruit to sell.

loans.name: Blanca Lidia

texts.es:
Blanca, solicita de nuevo otro préstamo para invertirlo en su negocio venta de pan dulce, francés y comprar más variedad para ofrecerles a sus clientes, con la idea de poder mejorar cada día en sus ingresos.
Blanca esta contenta y considera que los financiamientos anteriores le han ayudado a solventar la necesidad y solventar la situación económica que tenían antes.
texts.en:
Blanca is asking for a new loan to invest in her business selling sweet bread and French bread.  She will buy a wider variety to offer her customers with the goal of increasing her income on a daily basis.

Blanca is satisfied and believes that her previous loans have helped her cover her needs and resolve her past financial situation.

loans.use: to buy sweet bread and French bread

loans.name: Brigida

texts.es: Brígida tiene 30 años, convive con Herminio de 31 años, fruto de esta relación tienen 1 hijo. Juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de villa virgen del distrito de LLochegua. Brígida es una mujer humilde de buenos principios, se dedica al cultivo de cacao desde los 19 años. En un inicio empezó trabajando como peon para otros, pero poco a poco fue ahorrando su capital y con el apoyo de su esposo cultivaron plantas de cacao sobre una parcela que su padre les heredó. Mientras que las plantas crecían, les daba su mantenimiento ya que el cacao empieza a dar sus frutos después de 2 años. Ella esta contenta y satisfecha por las cosas que ha logrado, y por ello no pierde las esperanzas que mas adelante pueda montar un negocio donde pueda ganar más dinero. Este será su primer credito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1,500 soles, lo invertirá en la compra de un terreno agrícola.
texts.en:
Brígida, 30, lives with Herminio, 31, and they have a son.  They live together in their own house located in the community of Villa Virgen in Llochegua District.  Brígida is a humble woman of good principles.  

She’s been farming cocoa beans since the age of 19.  At the beginning she worked as a day laborer for others but gradually saved up capital and with her husband’s support farmed cocoa beans on a piece of farmland her father passed down to them.  While the plants were growing she’d care for them since cocoa bean plants don’t start producing fruit for two years.  

She is happy and satisfied with the things she’s accomplished and because of that she does not lose hope that later on she will be able to set up a business where she’ll be able to earn more money.  This will be her first MFP loan and she commits to make her installment payments punctually.  She will use the 1500 soles to buy a piece of farmland.

loans.use: to buy farmland.

loans.name: Marcela

texts.es: La Sra. Marcela es cliente antigua que solicita el crédito para el incremento de capital para su tienda y de su segunda actividad que es de reciclaje de plásticos y papeles, actualmente la Sra. Tiene una tienda de barrio ubicado en el mismo domicilio en la zona de las lomas, cuenta con una antigüedad de mas de siete años en la zona su tienda es una de las mas surtidas del lugar y su utilidad es relativamente alta es por eso que una parte del crédito quiere utilizarlo para surtir su tienda debido a la demanda que existe por la zona, en su segunda actividad  ella trabaja con la ayuda de su hija que también se dedica al reciclaje de plásticos y papeles, para su posterior venta por cantidad.
texts.en: Marcela is a longstanding client who requests the loan to increase capital for her store and for her second activity: recycling plastic and paper.  Currently, she has a neighborhood store located in her house in the Las Lomas neighborhood.  It’s been in operation more than seven years and it’s one of the best-stocked stores in her zone.  Her profits are fairly high and this is why she’s going to use part of this loan to tock the store because of the demand that exists in the zone.  In her second activity, she works with help from her daughter who also works recycling plastic and paper for subsequent sale in quantity.

loans.use: to increase capital in her store and in her second activity: recycling plastic and paper.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es: José, solicita un nuevo préstamo para seguir mejorando su negocio, puesto que en esta época se vende mucho las frutas y desea comprar: naranjas, sandia, melones, guineos, manzanas, fresas, para tener variedad de fruta fresca, y de esa manera incrementar las ventas y los ingresos sean mejores. El préstamo anterior le ayudo mucho porque el negocio se mantiene estable y en las ventas mejoraron;  el resultado de la inversion es que él y su familia vive en mejores condiciones.
texts.en: José is asking for a new loan to continue improving his business because this season he sells a lot of fruit and he wants to buy oranges, watermelons, bananas, apples and strawberries to have a variety of fresh fruit available to thus increase sales and so that income will be better.  The previous loan helped him a lot because his business maintains stability and sales improve.  The result of the investment is that he and his family live in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy fruit.

loans.name: Jose Estanislao

texts.es: José, nuevamente necesita otro préstamo para invertirlo en la agricultura y comprar los fertilizantes que necesita como: abono, herbicidas, semilla, de esa manera lograra obtener mejores cosechas el cual le permitirá tener mejores resultados. José considera que los prestamos anteriores le ayudaron porque mejoro las condiciones de vida de su familia, dejo una parte de granos básicos para el consumo diario y lo demás lo vendió a sus clientes.
texts.en: José once again needs a new loan to invest in farming and to buy the fertilizers he needs like manure, herbicide and seeds so that he can attain better harvests which will allow him to have better results.  José believes that the previous loans helped him because he improved his family’s living conditions and was able to keep part of the basic grains for their own daily consumption and sell the rest to his customers.

loans.use: to buy manure, herbicide and seeds.

loans.name: Yoni

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal "QAPAC QOLLA"; El banco esta situado en el Distrito de Iscuchaca en la Provincia de Anta perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yoni; ella tiene 23 años de edad, la soica es conviviente y tiene 2 menores hijos; su conyugue es mototaxista y el le lleva  al socia a la feria de Inquilpata a vender chicharron todos los días de feria, la socia solicita en esta ocasión invertir el prestamo en la compra de insumos y de sillas para la venta de su chicharron, ella compra chancho, cebollas, hierba buena, maíz, papa para acompañar el rico potaje; la socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de insumos y de sillas de platico para sus comensales.

La socia agradece el credito y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
Yoni, 23, belongs to the “Qapacqolla” communal bank located in Iscuchaca District in Anta Province belonging to Cusco Department.  She has a spouse and two minor children.  Her spouse is a mototaxi driver and he takes her to the Inquilpata street market to sell chicharrón [fried pork skin] every market day. 

On this occasion, she’s asking for a loan to buy ingredients and plastic chairs for her chicharrón sales.  She buys pork, onions, spearmint, corn and potatoes to accompany the delicious stew.  She’s asking for the loan to buy ingredients and plastic chairs for her patrons.  She is grateful for the loan and commits to make her payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and plastic chairs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy thread.

loans.name: Ramiro

texts.es: Ramiro, tiene la edad  de 52 años, está casado,  vive con su  hijo y su esposa que son su mayor prioridad. El con su crédito pretende compra los insumos como fertilizantes, herbicidas y plaguicidas para mantener su cultivo en buenas condiciones. El lo que quiere es a su  cultivo lo necesario para ponerlo a producir en óptimas condiciones para asa generar una muy buena cosecha  para su posterior venta. el tiene como meta aumentar su ganancias de la producción y así darle a su familia un mejor bienestar familiar cada día y también estabilizar su economía para tiempos duros de trabajo. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Ramiro, 52, is married living with his son and his wife who are his greatest priority.  He intends to use the loan to buy supplies like fertilizer, herbicide and insecticides to keep his crops in good condition.  He wants to provide his crops with everything needed so that they will produce optimally thus generating a very good harvest for subsequent sale.  His goal is to increase profits from the production to provide his family with better wellbeing every day and to also stabilize his economy for the hard times at work.  This is the first loan from Fudecosur.  He’s had no previous loans with state banks and Fudecosur has provided the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Juan Pablo

texts.es:
Juan Pablo tiene 35 años es soltero tiene dos hijos vive con los hijos de 11 y 7 años de edad en el Recinto Caimito en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito 1, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Juan Pablo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz. Desde hace cinco  años. Las compras y las Ventas lo hace en Ventanas.

El crédito lo solicita para la compra de semillas, insumos, fertilizantes  para la siembra del maíz,   El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia. El sueño  es poder comprar un carro y así  tener estabilidad económica   para su familia.

En los tiempos libres me gusta  hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Juan Pablo is 35 years old; he’s single and has two children.  He lives with his children who are 11 and 7 years old in Recinto Caimito in Ventanas Canton.

The “La Verdad Nos Hará Libres” (The Truth Will Make Us Free) communal bank is located in Recinto Caimito I belonging to Ventanas Canton.  It’s dedicated to short cycle corn and rice farming.

Juan Pablo has been a corn and rice farmer for five years.  His purchases and sales take place in Ventanas.

He requests the loan to buy seeds, supplies and fertilizer for his corn crops.  The loan has helped him increase income for his family’s use.  His dream is to be able to buy a car and to have economic stability for his family.  In his free time he enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds, supplies and fertilizer.

loans.name: Rolando Marcelo

texts.es: El señor Rolando se dedica al comercio de temporada emprendió su propio negocio hace 2 años en la temporada navideña sale a vender foquitos navideños, imágenes de porcelana, nacimientos entre otros, por este motivo solicito el crédito para la compra de focos, nacimientos, etc.  en la feria navideña pasadas las fechas ya tiene planificado dedicarse a vender otros productos según la temporada en las festividades que se aproximan, vive en alquiler junto a su conyugue y su pequeño hijo en la zona villa Busch  ubicado al norte de la ciudad de Cochabamba, indica que  con su actividad logra sustentar a su familia ya que este el único ingreso que tiene;  el señor esta muy agradecido por la confianza en la otorgación del crédito, ya que este es un apoyo muy grande para el para mejorar sus ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rolando sells holiday merchandise for a living.  He started his own business two years ago and around Christmas he sells Christmas lights, porcelain images, and Nativity scenes, among other things.  He is asking for this loan to buy lights, Nativity scenes, etc. at the Christmas fair.  When this season is over, he has plans to sell other products according to the holiday that is nearest.  He lives in a rental unit with his partner and his young son in the Busch neighborhood, which is in the northern part of the city of Cochabamba.  He tells us that his business supports his family as it is the only source of income they have.  He is very thankful for the trust shown in offering him this loan as it helps him improve his income greatly and, along with it, his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy Christmas merchandise

loans.name: Faustino

texts.es:
Faustino es una persona joven, de profesión electromecánico, está acompañado, tiene una hija de 4 años, vive en la ciudad de Pilar. Es una persona muy activa, responsable y trabajadora, con muchas amistades, muy querida en el barrio.
El nos comenta que empieza a trabajar desde muy tempranas horas del día y que vuelve a la casa ya muy entrada la noche. Su deseo es poder darle a su familia todo lo mejor, todo lo que el no tuvo, para que no pasen por privaciones. Desea que su hija pueda ir a la escuela y se convierta, en el futuro, en una persona de bien.
Manifiesta que solicita el crédito para la compra de repuestos y accesorios de vehículos para poder tener disponible los mismos cuando tenga que utilizarlos. Agradece por la oportunidad que Kiva y fundación paraguaya le están dando.
texts.en:
Faustino is a young person and a professional electromechanic.  He is in a relationship and has a 4 year old daughter.  He lives in the town of Pilar. Faustino is very active, responsible and hardworking.  He has many friends, and is loved in the neighborhood.
