Faustino comments that he begins work at very early hours of the day and returns home very late at night. His desire is to give his family the best, all the things that he did not have, so that they do not go through hardships.  Faustino wants his daughter to go to school and to become a good person in the future.

Faustino is requesting a loan to purchase vehicle parts and accessories to have available when he needs them. He thanks Kiva and Fundación Paraguaya for the opportunity they are giving him.

loans.use: Buy spare parts to supply his shop.

loans.name: Carmen Pilar

texts.es:
Carmen Pilar tiene 54 años de edad es casada, vive con el esposo no tiene hijos vive en el Recinto Caimito en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla  LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto el Caimito 1, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Carmen Pilar se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz.  Las Compras y las ventas lo hace en ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, insumos, fertilizantes  para la siembra del maíz,   El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia. Su sueño  es poder alcanzar a cumplir su meta que es la compra de un terreno para  poder  tener mayores ingresos  para su familia.

En los tiempos libres me gusta leer la Biblia cantar y orar.
texts.en:
Carmen Pilar is 54 years old and married.  She lives with her husband, and has no children. She lives in the Caimito district in the Ventanas canton.

The communal bank "LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES" ["The Truth Will Set Us Free"] is located in the El Caimito 1 district, which is part of Ventanas canton.  The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Carmen Pilar works in agriculture, growing corn and rice.  She purchases her supplies and makes her sales in Ventanas.

The requested loan is for the purchase of seeds, supplies, and fertilizers for growing corn.  The loan will help her increase her income for her family's use.  Her dream is to be able to achieve her goal, which is to purchase some land so as to have greater income for her family.

In her free time, she likes to read the bible, to sing and to pray.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, supplies, and fertilizers for growing corn.

loans.name: Pablo Humberto

texts.es: Pablo Humberto, está soltero, y vive con sus padres y hermanos que son su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito pretende comprar terneros para criarlos y engordarlos para su posterior venta. el actualmente cuenta con un terreno apto para la explotación de este proyecto por lo cual quiere invertir. El tiene como meta generar el máximo de provecho de su terreno y así poder engordar los animales lo más rápido posible y así venderlos al mercado de la localidad, generando ganancias para su bienestar familiar y su estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Pablo Humberto is single, and lives with his parents and siblings who are his main priority in life.  

With the loan, he intends to purchase cattle to raise and fatten for later sale.  He currently has a piece of land suitable for this project in which he is looking to invest.

He has as his goal to generate the maximum advantage from his land and be able to fatten up his animals as quickly as possible.  In this way he will be able to sell them at the local market, generating earnings for his family's well-being and his financial stability.

This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR.  He hasn't taken any other loans from the state banks, but FUDECOSUR offered him a loan with better terms and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to raise.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan Antonio tiene 31 años es casado tiene dos hijos, vive con la cónyuge y los hijos de 4 y 8 años. Vive en el Recinto Caimito en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito 1, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Juan Antonio se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, fréjol. Desde hace cinco  años, también a la criar gallinas chanchos pavos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de insumos, fertilizantes, semillas, ures  para la siembra del maíz, para comprar la comida apropiada para sus animales. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el bienestar de la familia. Su sueño  es poder tener estabilidad económica, y poder comprarse una casa  para su familia.

En los tiempos libres me gusta  hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Juan Antonio is 31 years old, and is married with two children.  He lives with his wife and children, aged 4 and 8, in the Caimito district in the Ventanas canton.

The communal bank "LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES" is located in the Caimito 1 district, which is part of Ventanas canton.  The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Juan Antonio works in agriculture growing corn and beans.  For the last five years, he has also raised chickens, pigs and turkeys.  He purchases his supplies in Ventanas, and makes his sales in the market in that same location.

The requested loan is for the purchase of supplies, fertilizers, seeds, and urea for growing corn, and for purchasing appropriate feed for his livestock.

The loan will help him to increase his income for the well-being of his family.  His dream is to be able to have financial stability, and to be able to purchase a house for his family.

In his free time, he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to purchase supplies, fertilizers, seeds and urea for growing corn.

loans.name: Constantina

texts.es: Constantina tiene 50 años de edad, está casado con Eudosio de 54 años, fruto de esta relación tienen 6 hijos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia en el centro poblado de Canayre del distrito de LLochegua. Constantina, es una mujer dedicada al trabajo en el campo, pues ahí cultiva cacao junto a su esposo, sobre su parcela agrícola que se encuentra ubicada dentro de los limites de su comunidad. Ella nos comenta que antes de iniciarse en el rubro agrícola, antes tenía una tienda de abarrotes, sin embargo las dificultades sociales y economicas que atravesaba el país tuvo que dejar de trabajar e invertir en su negocio. Ahora agradece a sus hermanos, quienes la apoyaron con el trabajo en el campo, y por ello sus productos los expende en canayre a los acopiadores, quienes ofrecen un buen precio. Constantina mas adelante desea reabrir su tienda de abarrotes. Este será su segundo credito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Constantina esta contenta con su banco comunal por que son bien unidos para todo trabajo. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles, realizará el mantenimiento de su parcela agrícola, para ello contratará peones.
texts.en:
Constantina is 50 years old and married to Eudosio, who is 54. They have 6 children and live in their own home in the town of Canayre in Llochegua District. Constantina is a woman dedicated to farming and cultivates cacao with her husband on a parcel of land located within the boundaries of her community. She tells us that before starting as a farmer she had a grocery store. However due to the social and economic problems that her country was undergoing, she had to stop working and investing in her business. Now, thanks to her brothers who help her with work in the fields she sells her products in Canayre to middlemen who offer a good price.

In the future Constantina wants to re-open her grocery store. This will be her second loan with MFP and she is committed to making her payments punctually. She is pleased with her communal bank because the members all work together. With the 1,500 nuevos soles, she will contract day laborers to do maintenance on her farm.

loans.use: to hire day laborers.

loans.name: Juana Maria

texts.es:
La señora Juana Maria es casada, tiene 19 años de edad, tiene 1 hijo, se dedica al comercio a la venta de ropa tipica, lleva 1 asño de experiencia en este negocio.

solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para ampliar su capital de trabajo en la compra de mercaderías, consistente en ropa típica, reboso, cortes, fajas, chalinas, etc. Espera en el futuro tener un capital amplio y mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Señora Juana Maria is 19 years old and married with one son.  She works selling traditional clothing; she has one year of experience in this business.

She is requesting a loan which she will use to increase her working capital by purchasing merchandise consisting of traditional clothing: shawls, skirts, belts, scarves, etc.  She hopes to have greater capital in the future and to improve her earnings.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Lorenzo Urbano

texts.es:
Lorenzo Urbano tiene 53 años es casado , y vive con su esposa  y su hijo de 14 años. Vive en el Recinto Caimito 1en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito 1, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Lorenzo Urbano  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz.  Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de insumos, fertilizantes, líquidos para la maleza para la siembra del maíz, El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia. Su sueño es poder comprar una finca y así poder  gozar de  buena salud y  estar unidos con la familia.

En los tiempos libres le gusta leer la Biblia y conversar con los amigos de la palabra de dios.
texts.en:
Lorenzo Urbano is 53 years old and is married.  He lives with his wife and 14-year-old son in the Caimito 1 district in Ventanas Canton.

The communal bank "LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES" ["The Truth Will Set Us Free"] is located in the Caimito 1 district, which is part of Ventanas canton.  The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Lorenzo Urbano works in agriculture growing corn and rice.  He purchases his supplies in Ventanas, and makes his sales in the market there.

He is requesting the loan for the purchase of supplies, fertilizers, and weed-killers for growing corn.  The loan will help him to increase his income for his family's use.  His dream is to be able to purchase some property, and so be able to enjoy good health and be together with his family.

In his free time, he likes to read the Bible and discuss the word of God with his friends.

loans.use: to purchase supplies, fertilizers, and weed-killers for growing corn.

loans.name: Rosa Maribel

texts.es:
Rosa, nuevamente solicita otro préstamo para comprar un coche móvil y le facilita mejor andar los productos de mariscos como: conchas, pescado, camarones, de esa forma podrá trasladarse a varias zonas con el objetivo de vender sus productos a sus clientes.
Ella ha logrado mejorar con los prestamos anteriores que le ayudaron a siempre mantener el negocio estable, ella como su familia viven en mejores condiciones de vida que antes.
texts.en:
Rosa is requesting a new loan to purchase a vehicle which will make it easier to transport her shellfish products, such as conchs, fish, and shrimp.  In this way she will be able to transport them to different areas with the goal of selling her products to her customers.

She has seen improvements from her previous loans, which have helped her in keeping her business stable.  She and her family are living in better living conditions than they were previously.

loans.use: to purchase a vehicle for selling conchs, fish and shrimp.

loans.name: Pilar

texts.es:
Pilar, vive en Yalaguina municipio de Estelí, tiene 51 años de edad e dedica a la venta de comida, tiene tres hijos los cuales ya son independientes. Ella tiene 20 años con su negocio de venta de comida, el empezó con un capital que su esposo le dio, antes ella trabajaba como enfermera auxiliar hasta que empezó a vender comida para dedicarse por completo al negocio. Tiene como expectativas ampliar su negocio con mas platos de comidas ofreciendo variedad, comprar inventario como empaques, cubiertos , platos , así como mejorar la infraestructura de su comideria. 
Ella requiere el préstamo para compra de materia prima como arroz, frijoles, azúcar ,aceite, vegetales para realizar sus platillos. En lo futro le gustaría comprar un terreno para construir una vivienda para alquilarla y generar otros ingresos pues es una mujer que le gusta el progreso y salir delante de manera honrada.
texts.en:
Pilar lives in Yalaguina, a town in Estelí.  She is 51 years old, and has three children who are all financially independent.  

She has 20 years experience with her business selling food.  She began with some capital that her husband gave her.  Beforehand, she worked as an auxiliary nurse, until she began to sell food and focused completely on her business.

She has as her goals to expand her business with more dishes so that she can offer variety, and to purchase inventory such as packaging, flatware, and dishes, and int his way improve her establishment's infrastructure.

She is requesting the loan to purchase raw ingredients such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, and vegetables for making her dishes.  

In the future, she would like to buy some land to build a house which she will be able to rent out and generate additional income, as she is a woman who likes progress and to move ahead in life in an honorable way.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients such as rice, beans, sugar, oil and vegetables.

loans.name: Daniel Eliceo

texts.es:
Daniel Eliceo tiene 33 años es casado, y vive con su  cónyuge y sus tres hijos de 6, 5, 11,  años  Vive en el Recinto el Caimito Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito 1 , perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Daniel Eliceo  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Desde hace cinco  años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de insumos, fertilizantes, líquido para la siembra del maíz,   El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia. Su sueño  es poder comprar un terreno y así poder tener estabilidad económica   para su familia.

En los tiempos libres me gusta  jugar indor y pasar  con toda mi familia.
texts.en:
Daniel Eliceo is 33 years old, married and lives with his spouse and three children who are 6, 5, and 11 years of age. He lives in Caimito Precinct in Ventanas Canton. 

La Verdad Nos Hará Libres (The Truth Will Make Us Free)  Communal Bank is located in Caimito 1 Precinct, part of Ventanas Canton. This communal bank is dedicated to short cycle corn and rice farming.

Daniel Eliceo has been farming corn for five years. He buys supplies in Ventanas and sells his crops in a market in the same place. 

He requested a loan to purchase supplies, fertilizer and liquid to plant the corn. The loan will help him increase his income for family consumption. His dream is to be able to buy land and thus gain economic stability for his family.

In his free time he likes to play indoor soccer and spend time with his family.

loans.use: to buy supplies, fertilizer  and liquid to plant corn.

loans.name: Angelita Magdalena

texts.es:
Angelita Magdalena tiene 44 años vive en unión libre junto a la pareja tiene un hijo de 25 años de edad, vive en el Recinto Caimito Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla  LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto el Caimito 1, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Angelita Magdalena se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz.  Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, insumos, fertilizantes  para la siembra del maíz,   El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia. el sueño  es poder alcanzar a cumplir su meta que es la compra de un terreno para  poder  tener mayores ingresos  para su familia.

En los tiempos libres me gusta leer la Biblia cantar y orar.
texts.en:
Angelita Magdalena is 44, and is in a common-law relationship with her partner.  She has a 25 year-old son, and lives in Recinto Caimito 1, in Ventanas canton.

The "La Verdad Nos Hará Libre" (The Truth Shall Make Us Free) communal bank is located in Recinto Caimito 1, which is part of Ventanas canton. The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice. 

Angelita Magdalena is a farmer and grows corn and rice. She buys her supplies in Ventanas and sells her products in the market of the same place. She applied for the loan to buy seeds, agricultural supplies, and fertilizers for growing corn. The loan has helped her to increase her income for the use of her family.

Her dream is to succeed in fulfilling her goal, which is to purchase a plece of land to be able to have greater income for her family. In her free time she likes to read the Bible, sing, and pray.

loans.use: To buy seeds, agricultural supplies, and fertilizers for growing corn.

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es:
Francisco, de oficio agricultor, habita en el municipio de San juan Limay en Estelí, el con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio aprendió a leer y a escribir. En este municipio donde sus terrenos son muy fértiles sobretodo para siembra de hortalizas el cultiva hermosos y frescos repollos, cebolla y tomates que con sus hermosos colores adornan los campos a orillas de la carretera. El lleva 15 años sembrando por sus propios medios. Antes el estuvo trabajando en Costa Rica y con lo que ahorro regreso su  tierra y fue que comenzó a sembrar sus hortalizas el tenia 20 años. Hoy en día el es que mantiene a su esposa y sus dos hijos con este negocio, también hace trabajos de albañil oficio que aprendió cuando estuvo en Costa Rica. 
El requiere el préstamo para compra de insumos, pago de mano de obra para sembrar ½ manzana de tomate. Esto le ayudara a sacar una producción de muye buena calidad ya que lo poco que tiene no cubre el costo de producción. 
Una de sus metas es mejorar el sistema de riego pata sus cultivos y comprar una motobomba para fumigar y evitar la propagación de plagas en su cosecha.  Siempre quiere diversificar sus cultivos y ampliar las áreas de siembra .
texts.en:
Francisco, a farmer, lives in the town of San Juan Limay in Esteli Department. Through a great deal of effort and sacrifice he learned to read and write. In this town with land that is very fertile, above all for vegetable cultivation, Francisco grows beautiful, crisp  cabbages, onions and tomatoes which adorn the fields along the highway with their lovely colors. He has been cultivating crops on his own for 15 years. Previously he was working in Costa Rica and he returned to his country with his savings and that was when he started planting vegetables. He was 20 years old. Nowadays he supports his wife and his two children with this business. He also works as a bricklayer, a job he learned while he was in Costa Rica.

Francisco needs the loan to purchase supplies and pay a workforce to sow approximately .865 an acre of tomatoes. This will help him to produce a very good quality crop since his own scarce resources would not cover the cost of production.

One of his goals is to improve the irrigation system for his crops and buy a pump to fumigate them and prevent the spread of pests.

loans.use: to buy supplies and pay a work force to plant approximately .865 an acre of tomatoes.

loans.name: Johnny Andres

texts.es:
Johnny Andres tiene 29 años vive en unión libre junto a la pareja no tiene hijos. Vive en el Recinto Caimito en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Johnny Andres se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz. Desde hace cuatro años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de insumos, fertilizantes, líquidos, urea para la siembra del maíz, así. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia. Su sueño es poder  tener una firma propia.
En los tiempos salir a hacer deporte.
texts.en: Johnny Andres is 29 years old and lives with his partner in the Caimito neighborhood in the town of Ventanas, Ecuador. He has no children. The community bank La Verdad Nos Hara Libres ("The Truth Will Set Us Free") is located in the same area, and it is dedicated to short-cycle agricultural harvests of corn and rice. Johnny has made a living planting these crops for the past four years. He buys his supplies in Ventanas and sells his products in the same market. He is requesting the loan to purchase supplies, fertilizers, liquids and urea for planting corn. The loan will help him increase his income for his family. His dream is to be able to have his own company. He plays sports in his free time.

loans.use: to purchase supplies, fertilizers, liquids and urea to plant corn.

loans.name: Sonia Yanira

texts.es:
Sonia, debido a la temporada de diciembre que es la época que más se vende, solicita otro préstamo para invertirlo en su negocio de comida y comprar materia prima como: pollo, arroz, espaguetis, tomates, zanahorias, asi podrá tener lo necesario para atender mejor a sus clientes y mejorar cada día sus ingresos.
El efecto de Sonia con los prestamos anteriores, ha sido muy buenos, le ayudaron a fortalecer su negocio y a mejorar el nivel las ventas, ademas a apoyar a su familia con los gastos de la casa.
texts.en: Sonia, due to the high sales volume she had in December, is requesting another loan to invest in her food business and purchase products such as chicken, rice, spaghetti, tomatoes and carrots, so she will be able to have the necessary items to better tend to her customers and improve her income every day. Sonia's previous loans have made a very good impact, helping her strengthen her business and increase her sales levels, as well as support her family with household expenses.

loans.use: to purchase chicken, meats, sausages, bologna and other products.

loans.name: Alfredo Alejandro

texts.es:
Alfredo Alejandro tiene 18 años es soltero y vive con sus padres, Vive en el Recinto Caimito en el Cantón Ventanas no tiene hijos.

La ventanilla LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito 1, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz. 

Alfredo Alejandro  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz.  Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, urea, insumos, fertilizantes  para la siembra del maíz,  El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia.
En los tiempos libres me gusta jugar indor.
texts.en: Alfredo Alejandro is 18, single and lives with her parents in the Caimito neighborhood in the town of Ventanas, Ecuador. The community bank La Verdad Nos Hara Libres ("The Truth Will Set Us Free") is located in the same area and is dedicated to helping short-cycle farmers planting corn and rice. Alfredo makes a living planting corn. He buys his supplies in Ventanas and sells his products in the same market. He is requesting the loan to purchase seeds, urea, fertilizers and other supplies to plant corn. The loan will help him increase his income to help his family. He likes to play indoor soccer in his free time.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, urea, fertilizers and other supplies to plant corn.

loans.name: Pedro Raul

texts.es: Pedro Raúl es una emprendedor  que su actividad económica a la se dedica es una sastrería él ya ha tenido crédito con  Fundación León 2000, lo ha apoyado en brindarle crédito para aumentar su inventario, ha demostrado que es una persona responsable con objetivo y metas de mejorar en su negocio  y en su vida personal. Pedro Raúl nos expresa que gracias al apoyo con el financiamiento ha aumentado sus clientes fijos y eventuales que lo visitan ofreciéndole ofreciéndole una variedad de estilos de ropa y al gusto al cliente. Actualmente está solicitando crédito para comprar hilos, tijeras, telas, zipper entre otros productos necesarios para la elaboración de sus productos
texts.en: Pedro Raúl is an entrepreneur who makes his living as a tailor. He previously had a loan with Fundación León 2000 that helped him by offering credit to increase his inventory. He has shown himself to be a responsible person with goals and objectives to improve both his business and personal lives. Pedro Raúl expresses his gratitude for the support. Through the prior loan, he increased his regular customers as well as the number of prospective customers that he visits, offering a variety of styles of clothing for the customer's pleasure. Now, he is requesting a loan to buy thread, scissors, zippers, and other necessary materials for making his products.

loans.use: to buy thread, scissors, fabric, zippers, and other necessary materials

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es: Daniel de 32 años, está casado con Noemí de 26 años, fruto de esta relación tienen 2 hijos Emily de 7 años y Andres de 5 años. Juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicada en el centro poblado de Canayre del distrito de LLochegua. Daniel se dedica a la venta de licores en su pequeño bar ubicado en su ciudad y ya tiene más de 4 años de funcionamiento, y durante este tiempo ha superado muchas dificultades como el de tener un licencia. Gracias a la buena atención que ofrece a su cientela ha logrado tener más ganancias y con ello se compró su casa propia inclusive adquirió un terreno agrícola con plantaciones de cacao. Generalmente trabaja junto a su querida esposa quien le apoya en la atención a sus clientes, desde las 10:00 de la mañana hasta las 10:00 de la noche, el único inconveniente que Daniel tienes es que a veces cuando hay eventos debe de quedarse hasta altas horas de la mañana. Este será su segundo credito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles comprará mesas y sillas para la atención al cliente.
texts.en: Daniel, 32, is married to Noemí, who is 26 years old. They have two children together, Emily (7 years old) and Andres (5 years old). They live together in their own house, located in the population center of Canayre, in Llochegua district. Daniel sells spirits in his small bar, which is located in the city where he lives. He has already been in business for over four years, and during this time he has overcome many difficulties, such as obtaining a license. Thanks to the good service he provides his customers, he has achieved higher profits and used them to buy his own house and a plot of farmland for growing cocoa. He generally works from 10:00 in the morning until 10:00 at night. The only inconvenience is that sometimes, when there are events, Daniel has to stay until the wee hours of the morning. This will be his second loan with Microfinanzas Prisma and he promises to make his repayments punctually. He will buy tables and chairs for his customers with the 2,000 nuevos soles loan.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs

loans.name: Maria Linda

texts.es:
María, de nuevo necesita invertir en su negocio por eso solicita un nuevo préstamo para comprar la mercadería necesaria y comprar: pollo, pan de barra, jamón, salchichas y francés de esa forma podrá tener lo necesario para su venta y los ingresos serán mejores.
Los prestamos anteriores le ayudaron porque mejoro mucho en su inventario y lo mejor que su familia está mejor económicamente.
texts.en: María needs to invest in her business again, so she is requesting a new loan to invest in necessary merchandise. She will buy chicken, loaves of bread, ham, sausages, and french bread so that she will have what she needs to make her sales and improve her profits. María's previous loans helped her because she was able to greatly improve her inventory and, best of all, to improve her family's economic situation.

loans.use: to buy chicken, loaves of bread, ham, sausages, and french bread

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
A sus 59 años,  Julia se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en una pequeña bodega que posee, en este momento se encuentra viviendo con una de sus 7 hijos, todos ya son mayores de edad y cada uno es independiente, ella vive en la ciudad de Mala, ciudad ubicada aproximadamente a 1 hora de media de la capital del Perú, Lima.

La señora Julia es una mujer que a pesar de edad quiere continuar saliendo adelante y poder brindarse los ingresos necesarios que le permitan tener una mejor calidad de vida. Este negocio se inició gracias al dinero que percibía como pensión, decidió incursionar en este tipo de negocio e invertir el dinero que le ingresa mensualmente. Para poder seguir creciendo en su pequeña empresa, ella trabaja todos los días durante dos turnos uno desde las 7 a.m. hasta las 12 p.m. y en la tarde desde las 2 p.m. hasta las 9 p.m., este horario le permite tener un ingreso de S/.30 diarios.

Gracias a los prestatarios Kiva ella podrá comprar mucha más mercadería (Abarrotes en general) y variar sus productos para satisfacer las necesidades y gustos de sus clientes. Su sueño es poder ampliar su negocio, comprando (mostradores, una congeladora, entre otros), conversando con sus clientes ella también se ha podido dar cuenta que sería buena idea empezar a vender ropa, pero estas metas serán logradas sólo si su esfuerzo y dedicación se incrementan diariamente.
texts.en: At 59 years old, Julia sells groceries in a small bodega that she owns. At the moment, she is living with one of her seven children, who are all grown-up and independent. She lives in the city of Mala, which is located approximately one hour, on average, from Lima, the capital city of Peru. Ms. Julia is a woman who, despite her age, wants to continue improving so that she will be able to bring in the necessary income to have a better quality of life. She started her business thanks to the money she receives as a pension. She decided to venture into this type of business and invest the money that she receives each month. In order to keep growing her small business, she works every day in shifts -- one from 7:00 a.m. to 12:00 p.m. and the other in the afternoon from 2:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m. This schedule allows her to earn about 30 nuevos soles a day. Thanks to Kiva lenders, she will be able to buy much more merchandise (groceries in general) and diversify her products to satisfy the needs and preferences of her customers. Her dream is to be able to expand her business (to buy counters and a freezer, among other things). From talking to her customers, she has also realized that it would be a good idea to start selling clothing. She will only achieve these goals if her effort and dedication keep growing each day.

loans.use: to buy groceries to sell

loans.name: Carlos Tomas

texts.es:
Carlos Tomas tiene 19 años de edad es soltero y vive con los padres y el hijo de 1 año. Vive en el Recinto Caimito  en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito 1, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz, legumbre.

Carlos Tomas se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz desde hace siete años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, insumos, fertilizantes, urea, abonos para la siembra del maíz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia. Su sueño es poder  comprarse un carro para poder gozar de una buena salud y así poder estar unidos con la familia.

En los tiempos libres le gusta hacer deporte y jugar fútbol.
texts.en:
Carlos Tomas is 19 years old, single, and lives with his parents and one year-old son. He lives in the Caimito precinct of Ventanas canton.

The "La Verdad Nos Hará Libres" ["The Truth Will Make Us Free"] communal bank is located in Caimito precinct of Ventanas canton. The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, planting corn, rice, and vegetables.

Carlos Tomas has worked in agriculture, planting corn, for seven years. He buys his products in Ventanas and sells them at the market in the same place.

The requested loan is for buying seeds, materials, fertilizers, urea, and manure for growing corn. The loan will help him to increase his revenue and provide for his family. His dream is to be able to buy a car and to enjoy good health so that he can be with his family. 

In his free time, Carlos Tomas likes to play sports, especially soccer.

loans.use: to buy seeds, materials, fertilizers and manure for planting corn

loans.name: Blanca Lidia

texts.es:
Blanca, nuevamente solicita un préstamo el cual le ayudara aumentar en sus ganancias y comprar pan dulce, pan francés y llevarlos a los hogares de sus clientes de esa forma lograra que sus productos se vendan.
Blanca considera que los prestamos anteriores le ayudaron porque siempre tiene la mercadería necesaria y su familia vive mejor que antes.
texts.en: Blanca is again requesting a loan which will help her expand her earnings and purchase sweet bread and french bread and to take them to the homes of her customers, by which she will ensure her products are sold. Blanca considers that her previous loan helped her because she always has the necessary merchandise and her family lives better than before.

loans.use: to purchase sweet bread and french bread.

loans.name: La Amistad Group

texts.es: Jeni es integrante de la Alcancía Comunal “La Amistad” y está conformado por 10 socios, dicho grupo tiene 08 meses trabajando con el Programa- Prosperidad. Jeni tiene 41 años de edad es casada y tiene  02 hijos, actualmente sigue apoyando al menor de ellos, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de miel de abejas, su padre fue quien la motivo a emprender su propio negocio, ya que es él quien le abastece de dicho producto, también brinda servicio de limpieza de donde obtiene una ingreso mas para su hogar, con su trabajo y esfuerzo Jeni ha logrado mejorar su vivienda y actualmente apoyar a su menor hija en sus estudios. A futuro a Jeni le gustaría poner una bodega en su domicilio donde pueda ofrecer  productos de primera necesidad. En esta oportunidad  solicito el crédito para la compra de miel de abeja y así poder entregar sus pedidos a tiempo. La Alcancía Comunal "La Amistad" estan agradecidos con el crédito brindado. Adjuntamos la fotografía de Reymundo y Maruja.
texts.en: Jeni is a member of the "La Amistad" (friendship) Community Bank which is made up of 10 members. Said group has eight months working with the Prosperity Program. Jeni is 41 years old, is married and has two children. Currently she continues to support the youngest of them. She is dedicated to buying and selling bee honey. Her father motivated her to start her own business since he supplies this product. She also provides a cleaning service from which she obtains more income for her home. With her work and effort Jeni has managed to improve her house and currently supports her youngest daughter in her studies. In the future, Jeni would like to start a bodega in her house where she can offer basic necessity products. At this time she is requesting a loan for the purchase of bee honey and, in this way, to be able to deliver her orders on time. "La Amistad" Community Bank is thankful for the loan provided. We are attaching the photos of Reymundo and Maruja.

loans.use: to purchase bee honey.

loans.name: Juana Francisca

texts.es:
Juana, solicita un nuevo préstamo con la intención de mejorar su negocio de tortillas comprando: maíz, leña, gas, bolsas, asi podrá tener lo necesario para el sostenimiento de su negocio.
Ella considera que los prestamos anteriores le ayudaron porque el negocio está estable logro tener mejores resultados en sus ganancias y en clientes.
texts.en:
Juana is requesting a new loan because she wants to improve her activity by buying maize, firewood, gas and bags to make tortillas; in this way she will be able to acquire what she needs to support her activity.
She says that the previous loans have been of great helped for her because her activity is now stable and she has succeeded in obtaining better results both with her earning and with her customers.

loans.use: To buy maize, firewood, gas and bags.

loans.name: Maria Elsa

texts.es:
María, de nuevo solicita otro préstamo, el cual le ayudara mucho porque comprara los ingredientes para la comida ya que este fin de año le hacen muchos pedidos y comprara: pollo, carne, arroz, cebollas, tomates y otros ingredientes necesarios.
Para Maria su experiencia con los préstamos anteriores ha sido buena, ya que le ayudaron porque le permitió tener una mejor atencion a la clientela y su familia está mejor económicamente.
texts.en:
María is requesting a new loan that will be of great help for her: she will buy the ingredients she needs to prepare her meals, as in this year-end season she is receiving many requests. She will buy chicken, meat, rice, onions, tomatoes and other necessary ingredients.
Maria’s experience with her previous loans has been a good one: they have helped her improving the way she tends to her customers and thanks to them her family’s economic standard has improved.

loans.use: To buy chicken, meat, rice, onions, tomatoes and other ingredients.

loans.name: Fortunita

texts.es: Fortunita tiene 37 años, es viuda pero tiene 7 hijos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, ubicada en el centro poblado de canayre del distrito de LLochegua. Fortunita es una mujer trabajadora, que a pesar de haber pasado múltiples dificultades en su vida, una de ellas la de perder a su esposo, sola tuvo que trabajar muy duro para dar bienestar a sus hijosd. Su hijo mayor tuvo que dejar los estudios para ayudar a su madre en el trabajo y luego retomar su carrera de profesor. Actualmente Fortunita cultiva cacao y otros productos como el maíz, yuca y arroz y del que luego los expende en el mercado de su localidad. Pero su mayo ganancia proviene de la venta del cacao, por ser un producto que mayor demanda tiene en el mercado naional e internacional. En un futuro piensa abrir su propia tienda donde pueda expender productos alimenticios ya que vio una gran oportunidad en este negocio, porque dentro de su localidad no hay una tienda alguna. Este será su segundo credito con MFP, por lo que se compromete una vez mas en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles realizará la limpieza de las maleza de su campo agrícola, para ello contratará peones.
texts.en: Fortunita is 37 years old and she is a widow with she has 7 children. They all live in their own house, located in Canayre, a village in the Llochegua district. Despite the many difficulties she has had to face in her life, among which the loss of her husband, Fortunita is a hardworking woman who has had to work very hard and alone for the wellbeing of her children. Her eldest son had to quit studying to help his mother with her job, to then restart his career as a professor. Fortunita currently grows cocoa and other products such as maize, cassava and rice, and she sells them all in the market of her community. However, she earns her best income form the selling of cocoa, as there is a great request for this product on the national and international markets. In the future she wants to open her own shop in order to sell food products: she thinks this kind of activity has great potentials, as there is no similar shop in her community. This will be her second loan with MFP, and she commits once more to punctually repay her dues. The 2,000 PEN she is requesting will be used to pay for the laborers she will hire to clean the weeds in her fields.

loans.use: To pay for laborer that will clean her fields from weeds.

loans.name: Nelson Jesus

texts.es:
Nelson Jesus tiene 22 años es Soltero, vive con el papá en el Cantón Chillanes provincia  de Bolívar.

La ventanilla LUZ Y PROGRESO se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Josè de Guayabal a 15 minutos de la oficina perteneciente al cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz, mora, fréjol.

Nelson Jesus se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, fréjol, mora desde hace tres años. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de abono, urea, líquidos  fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz, fréjol, mora. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. 

El sueño es incrementar los sombríos de mora para tener mejores ingresos y así un mejor estilo de vida  Le gusta salir a jugar fútbol  y  que llegue el carnaval.
texts.en:
Nelson Jesus is 22 years old, he is single and he lives with his father in Chillanes, a canton in the Bolívar province.

LUZ Y PROGRESO (Light and Progress) is a Community Bank located in San José de Guayabal, 15 minutes away from the Chillanes office. The members of this Community Bank engage in short-cycle farming of maize, blackberries and beans.

Nelson Jesus has been engaged in agriculture for three years, growing maize, beans and blackberries. He buys and sells in Ventanas.

The loan he has requested will be used to buy manure, urea, insecticides and fertilizers to grow maize, beans and blackberries. The loan has helped him increase his income both for the needs of his family and to make investments.

His dream is to increase the blackberries production to earn a better income and consequently improve his standard of living. He likes playing soccer and he enjoys the carnival.

loans.use: To buy manure, urea, insecticides and fertilizers.

loans.name: Juana Ruth

texts.es:
La señora Juana Ruth es casada, tiene 34 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 3 hijos los cuales estudian, se dedica a la tejeduría de cortes típicos, servilletas, inicio este trabajo como operadora para otro negocio y hasta el momento lleva 4 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que le servirá para la compra de hilos de diferente colores y clases y mejorar su producción de tejido y por esto aumentar sus ganancias, espera en el futuro tener varios operarios en su negocio.
texts.en:
Juana Ruth is 34 years old, she is married, she did not have the change to study, and she has 3 children who go to school. She weaves cloths to create typical napkins and clothes. She started this activity as an employee in another shop and to date she has 4 years of experience.

She is requesting a loan she will use to buy threads of different colors and kinds to improve her knitting production, thus increasing her income. In the future she hopes to hire many workers in her shop.

loans.use: To buy threads of different colors and kinds.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha, de nuevo solicita un nuevo préstamo con el objetivo de seguir trabajando en su negocio de hamacas el cual tiene pedidos de sus clientes y comprara: hilos de seda y de cáñamo, de esa forma podrá tener los materiales necesarios que le permitan más ganancias. 
Los prestamos anteriores le beneficiaron porque pudo salir adelante con su familia y ahora viven mejor que antes.
texts.en:
Martha is requesting a new loan in order to keep on running her hammocks making activity. She has received requests from her customers and she will buy silk and hemp threads in order to have the necessary materials to produce her hammocks and earn more money.
Her previous loans have been good for her, as she has been able to provide for her family and their living conditions are now better than before.

loans.use: To buy silk and hemp threads.

loans.name: Jose Bolivar

texts.es:
José Bolívar tiene 25 años de estado civil Soltero, vive con su madre, en el Cantón Chillanes provincia  de Bolívar.

La ventanilla LUZ Y PROGRESO se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Josè de Guayabal, perteneciente al cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz, mora, fréjol.

José  Bolívar se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, fréjol, mora. Compra sus productos en Chillanes y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, abono, urea, líquidos  fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz, fréjol, mora. 

El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. El sueño es incrementar los sembríos de mora para tener mejores ingresos y así un mejor estilo de vida  Le gusta salir a jugar fútbol  y  que llegue el carnaval.
texts.en:
José Bolívar is 25 years old, he is single and he lives with his mother in Chillanes, a canton in the Bolívar province.

LUZ Y PROGRESO (Light and Progress) is a Community Bank located in San José de Guayabal, a district of the Chillanes canton. The members of this Community Bank engage in short-cycle farming of maize, blackberries and beans.

José Bolívar engagers in agriculture, growing maize, beans and blackberries. He buys products in Chillanes and sells his crops in the market of this same town.

The loan he has requested will be used to buy seeds, manure, urea, fertilizers and insecticides to grow maize, beans and blackberries.

The loan has helped him increase his income both for the needs of his family and to make investments. His dream is to increase the blackberries production to earn a better income and consequently improve his standard of living. He likes playing soccer and he enjoys the carnival.

loans.use: To buy seeds, manure, urea, fertilizers and insecticides.

loans.name: Milagro Isabel

texts.es:
Milagro, solicita un nuevo crédito con la intención de continuar en su negocio de hortalizas el cual cosecha: ejotes, pipián, chiles y tomates, para que este año sean mejores cosechas necesita comprar los insumos agrícolas para prevenirlo de las plagas como: herbicidas y abono; darles cada día mantenimiento.
Los prestamos anteriores le ayudaron porque mejoro económicamente con su familia y los ingresos fueron mejores que los años anteriores.
texts.en:
Milagro is requesting a new loan to carry on her vegetable production activity, harvesting string beans, pipiánes (pipián is a variety of squash known as ‘cushaw’ in the United States), chili peppers and tomatoes. In order to gain better harvests this year she needs to protect them from blight by buying farm supplies such as weed-killers and manure that need to be provided daily to the crops.
Her previous loans have helped her because her family’s economic conditions have improved and her income has been better than in the past.

loans.use: To buy weed-killers and manure.

loans.name: Maria Carmelina

texts.es:
María es una mujer soltera, tiene dos hijos y viven en Otavalo, Provincia de Imbabura, en la sierra norte de Ecuador. María es una mujer sencilla y trabajadora, le gusta salir adelante para el bienestar de su familia.

María trabaja 10 años en un puesto de venta de artesanías, es el séptimo año consecutivo que trabaja con Fodemi, el crédito que realiza actualmente es para invertir en la compra de materiales para realizar las artesanías como mullos, perlas de plástico, masa pan, pintura y también invertirá en la compra de ropa artesanal ya que desea entrar en el negocio de ropa. Esta inversión ayudará a María a obtener mejores ingresos con los cuales podrá mantener a su familia y mejorar su calidad de vida.

El sueño de María es poder tener un local propio para sus artesanías ya que tiene buena clientela y quiere servirles mejor.
texts.en:
María is a single mother of two children. They live in Otavalo, located in Imbabura, a province in the mountains of northern Ecuador. María is a very simple and hardworking woman, who likes working for the wellbeing of her family.

María has been working for 10 years in stall selling handicrafts. This is the seventh consequent year she has been working with Fodemi, and the loan she is currently requesting will be used to buy materials to create handicrafts such as beads, plastic pearls and paint, as well as to invest it in the purchase of handmade traditional clothing because she wants to engage in the clothes selling activity. This investment will help María earning a better income with which she will be able to provide for her family and improve their standard of living.

María wishes to run a place of her own where to sell her handicrafts, as she can count of well-established customers and she wants to tend to them in a better way.

loans.use: To buy materials to create handicrafts such as beads, plastic pearls and paint, as well as to invest it in the purchase of handmade traditional clothing to engage in the clothes selling activity.

loans.name: Nolberto Orlando

texts.es:
Norberto Orlando tiene 20 años de edad es Soltero, vive con su madre,en el  recinto San Josè de Guayabal Cantón Chillanes provincia  de Bolívar no tiene hijos.

La ventanilla LUZ Y PROGRESO se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Josè de Guayabal, perteneciente al cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz, mora, fréjol.

Norberto Orlando  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, fréjol, mora desde hace tres años. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Chillanes.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, abono, urea, líquidos  fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz, fréjol, mora. 

El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es incrementar los sombríos de mora para tener mejores ingresos y así un mejor estilo de vida  Le gusta salir a jugar fútbol  y  que llegue el carnaval.
texts.en:
Norberto Orlando is 20 years old, he is single and he lives with his mother in San José de Guayabal, a district of Chillanes, a canton in the Bolívar province.

LUZ Y PROGRESO (Light and Progress) is a Community Bank located in San José de Guayabal, a district of the Chillanes canton. The members of this Community Bank engage in short-cycle farming of maize, blackberries and beans.

Norberto Orlando has been engaged in agriculture for three years, growing maize, beans and blackberries. He buys and sells in Chillanes.

The loan he has requested will be used to buy seeds, manure, urea, fertilizers and insecticides to grow maize, beans and blackberries.

The loan has helped him increase his income both for the needs of his family and to make investments. His dream is to increase the blackberries production to earn a better income and consequently improve his standard of living. He likes playing soccer and he enjoys the carnival.

loans.use: To buy seeds, manure, urea, fertilizers and insecticides.

loans.name: Wilson Rogelio

texts.es:
Wilson Rogelio tiene  25 años de estado civil Soltero, vive con su papá, y con sus hijos de 2, años y 3 meses de edad en el Cantón Chillanes provincia  de Bolívar.

La ventanilla LUZ Y PROGRESO se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Josè de Guayabal, perteneciente al cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz, mora, fréjol.

Wilson Rogelio se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, fréjol. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Chillanes.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, abono, urea, líquidos  fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz, fréjol, mora. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. 

Su sueño es incrementar los sombríos de mora para tener mejores ingresos y así un mejor estilo de vida  Le gusta pasar junto a su hijo y  que llegue el carnaval.
texts.en:
Wilson Rogelio is 25 years old, he is single and he lives with his father and his two children aged 2 years old and 3 months old in Chillanes, a canton in the Bolívar province.

LUZ Y PROGRESO (Light and Progress) is a Community Bank located in San José de Guayabal, a district of the Chillanes canton. The members of this Community Bank engage in short-cycle farming of maize, blackberries and beans.

Wilson Rogelio engagers in agriculture, growing maize, beans and blackberries. He buys and sells in Chillanes.

The loan he has requested will be used to buy seeds, manure, urea, fertilizers and insecticides to grow maize, beans and blackberries. The loan has helped him increase his income both for the needs of his family and to make investments.

His dream is to increase the blackberries production to earn a better income and consequently improve his standard of living. He likes spending time with his children and he enjoys the carnival.

loans.use: To buy seeds, manure, urea, fertilizers and insecticides.

loans.name: Wendy Arely

texts.es:
Wendy, con el propósito de seguir trabajando en su negocio solicita un nuevo préstamo para comprar cerdos pequeños y crecerlos, para luego venderlos a buen precio.
Ella considera que el préstamo anterior le ayudo mucho porque obtuvo ganancias al vender los cerdos y les pudo dar los alimentos a sus hijos y ahora viven más estable.
texts.en:
Wendy is requesting a new loan because she wants to carry on with her activity: she will buy piglets that she will breed to then sell them for a good price.
She says that her previous loan has been of great help for her because she earned money by selling the pigs, because she was able to provide for her children and because they now live in steadier conditions.

loans.use: To buy piglets to breed and sell.

loans.name: Teofila

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal "JUNTOS DE LA MANO"; El banco esta situado en el Distrito de Iscuchaca en la Provincia de Anta perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Teofila; ella tiene 46 años de edad, la socia es viuda y tiene 6 hijos la socia se dedica  la compra y venta de animales menores y ala compra y venta de granos como maíz en los diferentes tipos, habas secas, porotos, frejoles, cebada, trigo y otros. La socia en esta ocasión desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de productos secos como los mencionados antes para implementar su mercaderia.

La socia agradece el credito y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
Introducing Teofila, a member of “JUNTOS DE LA MANO" (Holding Hands), a Communal Bank located in Iscuchaca, a district of the Anta province in the Cusco department.

Teofila is 46 years old, she is a widow and she has 6 children. She engages in buying and selling small animals and in buying and selling grains such as various varieties of maize, dried broad beans, green beans, lima beans, barley and wheat. In this occasion she wants to invest the loan in the purchase of dried goods such as the aforementioned ones in order to supply her stock.

She is thankful for the loan and she commits to complying with the repayment of her dues in the agreed time.

loans.use: To buy products such as maize, dried broad beans, green beans, lima beans, barley and wheat.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy curd, cheese, requesón and cream

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es:
Gerardo, solicita un nuevo préstamo por el motivo que ya es tiempo de recoger su cosecha y pagar mano de obra con el propósito de tenerla ya en casa, venderla y comprara ganado para crecerlos,  para obtener otros ingresos el cual le ayudara a su familia.
Los financiamientos anteriores le ayudaron porque obtuvo los fertilizantes necesarios para sus cosechas y este año fueron abundantes gracias al apoyo de nuestra institución que le brindo el apoyo necesario.
texts.en: Gerardo is requesting a new loan because it is time to gather in his harvest and he needs to pay laborers so that he can have it ready, sell it and buy cattle to raise.  This will enable him to obtain more income which will help his family.  His previous loans helped him to obtain the fertilizers he needed for his crops and this year they were abundant thanks to the support of our institution which gave him the support he needed.

loans.use: to pay laborers to gather his harvest

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to add to some money he already has and buy a plot of land

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel, solicita de nuevo otro préstamo debido que quiere seguir progresando en su negocio de medicina natural comprando mas productos por ejemplo: suplementos alimenticios, medicinas curativas, vitaminas, analgésicos, en fin para toda clase de enfermedad, de esa forma podrá tener variedad para sus ventas diarias con sus clientes.
Miguel cree que el prestamo anterior le ayudo porque compro mercadería permitiendole mejorar los ingresos para su familia.
texts.en: Miguel is requesting another loan again since he wishes to continue progressing in his natural medicine business by buying more products, such as nutritional supplements, curative medicines, vitamins and analgesics for every type of illness. In this way, he will be able to have variety for his daily sales to his customers. Miguel believes that the previous loan helped him because he bought merchandise permitting him to improve the income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase nutritional supplements, vitamins, analgesics.

loans.name: Fausto

texts.es: La señor Fausto es un cliente  distinguido de la  institución , ya  que a lo largo  de  sus  créditos se a  caracterizado  por  tener  una  excelente  cultura  de pagos,  es  por  ello  que   nuevamente   acudió  con    nosotros  para   la  culminar su proyecto, el cual  consiste  en  realizar  la  impermeabilización de su  vivienda, la cual  gracias  a su  esfuerzo  diario a  ido  acondicionando,  ve  en  el  crédito  la  posibilidad  de  brindar  a  sus  familiares  y  amigos  una  mayor  comodidad, es por  eso que  se  encuentra  muy contento  de  habernos  encontrado.
texts.en: Fausto is a distinguished client of our institution because, throughout the time he has been receiving loans, he has maintained an excellent repayment record.  He has come to us again to request help in completing his project of waterproofing his home which, thanks to his daily efforts, he has been making progress with.  Fausto sees in these loans the possibility of providing his family members and friends with greater comfort.  For this reason, he is very happy to have found us.

loans.use: to waterproof a concrete floor

loans.name: Janeth Del Rocío

texts.es:
Janeth es una mujer de 38 años, es casada y tiene 3 hijos, vive con su familia en Otavalo Provincia de Imbabura, en la sierra Norte de Ecuador. Janeth se describe como una persona trabajadora, luchadora, emprendedora y decidida en todo lo que hace.

Janeth trabaja con su esposo en la elaboración de pan, este negocio empesaron hace 8 años con un horno pequeño y no les generaba producción ni utilidades, gracias a la necesidad que tuvieron invirtieron su dinero y siguen creciendo económicamente, ahora con un crédito que le ayuda Fodemi pueden comprar una batidora de 20 litros, maquinaria que ayudará a optimizar tiempo, mejorar la producción y obtener buenos ingresos, con lo cual podrá mantener a sus hijos, darles el estudio y darles la vida que se merecen.

El sueño de Janeth es que su negocio crezca y poder emplear a personas que lo necesiten y también el sueño más grande es que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Janeth is a 38 year old woman. She is married and has three children. She lives with her family in Otavalo province of Imbabura in the northern mountains of Ecuador. Janeth is described as a hard-working, fighting, entrepreneurial and decisive woman in all that she does.

Janeth works with her husband making bread. They started this business eight years ago with a small oven and didn't generate production or profits. Due to the need, they invested their money and continued growing economically. Now with a loan from Fodemi they can buy a 20 litre mixer, machinery that will help optimize time, improve production and obtain good income with which they will be able to support their children, give them an education and the lives that they deserve.

Janeth's dream is that her business grows and she is able to employ people who need (to work) and also her biggest dream is that her children become professionals.

loans.use: to purchase a 20 litre mixer since this machinery will help to optimize time and improve production.

loans.name: Ana Aida

texts.es:
Ana, solicita de nuevo un nuevo préstamo con el objetivo de invertir en su negocio de tamales y comprar los ingredientes que necesita como: pollo, maíz, hojas de huerta, consomés, cominos, de esa forma podrá lo que necesita para atender mejor a sus clientes.
La intension de Ana es tener un negocio estable por eso se apoya de los prestamos que le ayudan a seguir con su negocio, ya que por falta de recursos ya no podía continuar y ahora han mejorado sus circunstancias de su familia y las ganancias han aumentado.
texts.en: Ana is requesting another loan with the objective of investing in her tamale business and buying ingredients that she needs like chicken, maize, orchard leaves, bouillon, cumin. In this way, she will have what she needs to serve her customers better. Ana's intention is to have a stable business so she relies on the loans that help her to continue with her business since, due to a lack of resources, she couldn't continue and now her family's circumstances have improved and her earnings have increased.

loans.use: to purchase chicken, maize, orchard leaves, bouillon, cumin.

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN COPACABANA DE OLLANTAYTAMBO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Andrea; ella tiene 50 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de jugos, ella vende jugos como naranja, papaya entre otras frutas, la socia vende en el mercado desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m,por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los jugos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar frutas como papaya, naranja, platano, leche y azúcar al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "Virgen Copacabana de Ollantaytambo" community bank. The bank is located in the Ollantaytambo district, belonging to the Urubamba province and department of Cusco.

The member is Andrea. She is 50 years old and is married and has two children. The member alternates her daily activities with the juice selling business. She sells juices like orange and papaya, among other fruits. The member sells in the market from 9AM until 4PM. Through these businesses, she gets her children ahead. Her dream is to have a shop where she can sell juices. The member is requesting the loan to buy fruit like papaya, orange, banana, milk and sugar at wholesale.

She is happy for the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy fruit like papaya, orange, banana, milk and sugar at wholesale.

loans.name: Rosa Amelia

texts.es:
Rosa Amelia tiene 33 años de estado civil Soltero, vive con su madre y el hijo de 6 meses de edad en el Cantón Chillanes provincia  de Bolívar.

La ventanilla LUZ Y PROGRESO se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Josè de Guayabal, perteneciente al cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz, mora, fréjol y la compra venta de chanchos.

Rosa Amelia se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, fréjol, mora y a la compra venta de chanchos. Las compras y las ventas de los productos lo hace en Chillanes. 

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, abono, urea, líquidos  fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz, fréjol, mora, y la comida apropiada para la alimentación de los chanchos. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es incrementar los sembríos de mora, y la compra venta de chanchos para tener mejores ingresos y así un mejor estilo de vida.

Le gusta arreglar la casa que llegue el carnaval.
texts.en:
Rosa Amelia is 33 years old and single. She lives with her mother and her 6-month-old son in the canton of Chillanes in the province of Bolívar. The branch "Luz y Progreso" ("light and progress") of her communal bank is located in the municipality of San José de Guayabal, belonging to the canton of Chillanes. This branch provides loans for short-term agricultural activities, such as sowing corn, blackberries and beans, or buying and selling pigs.

Rosa Amelia is a farmer who grows corn, blackberries and beans, as well as buys and sells pigs. She buys and sells her products in Chillanes.

She applies for the loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, urea and liquid fertilizer to grow corn, blackberries and beans, as well as suitable feed for pigs. The loan helps her to increase her income to pay for family expenses and invest in her business. Her dream is to increase her crop of blackberries and buy pigs to fatten in order to earn more money and thus have a better living standard.

She wants to repair her house ahead of the carnival festivities.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, urea and liquid fertilizer to grow corn, beans and blackberries.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN COPACABANA DE OLLANTAYTAMBO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gladys; ella tiene 36 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de cds de música y películas, ella vende en el mercado desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local  donde pueda vender cds y películas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cds y películas al por mayor. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Señora Gladys is a member of the communal bank "Virgen Copacabana de Ollantaytambo" located in the district of Ollantaytambo, which belongs to the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco.

Gladys, aged 36, lives in a common-law marriage and is the mother of two children. She alternates her daily chores with her activity in her stall at the market, where she sells music CDs and films from 8 am to 5 pm. This business enables her to provide for her children. Her dream is to have her own premises to sell CDs and films. She applies for the loan to buy CDs and films wholesale.

Gladys is happy for the loan and promises to comply with the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy CDs and films wholesale.

loans.name: Yovana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal "JUNTOS DE LA MANO"; El banco esta situado en el Distrito de Iscuchaca en la Provincia de Anta perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yoni; ella tiene 23 años de edad, la socia es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; la socia trabaja como recepcionista en una empresa de telefonia basica particular ella es una mujer trabajadora y en esta ocasión desea el credito para uso personal, la socia desea el credito para consumo, ella invertira en compra de viveres para su hogar al por mayor. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra deviveres.



La socia agradece el credito y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
Señora Yovana is a member of the communal bank "Juntos de la mano" ("hand in hand") located in the district of Iscuchaca in the province of Anta, which belongs to the department of Cusco.

Yoni (short for Yovana), aged 23, is single and the mother of a son. She works as a receptionist in a private telephone company. She is a hard-working woman and applies now for a loan for personal use. She wants the loan to buy consumer goods. She will buy wholesale groceries for her household. She applies for the loan to invest in the purchase of provisions.

Yovana is happy for the loan and promises to comply with the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy groceries wholesale.

loans.name: Darling Nohemi

texts.es:
Darling, es una joven emprendedora de 22 años de edad, originaria de Estelí, es casada, de oficio comerciante es dueña de una pulpería la cual tiene 3 años de tenerla. Empezó con este  negocio vendiendo solo pollo pero sus clientes le preguntaban a ella por otro tipo de productos comestibles fue que introdujo granos básicos, productos de limpieza poco a poco su esposo la apoyo desde el principio ya que el le dio un pequeño capital para que comprara productos, su esposo trabajo en la municipalidad como técnico del ministerio de educación es, este ha sido su primer negocio el cual ha surgido poco a poco.   
Ella realizo el crédito para comprar arroz, azúcar frijoles, jugos, galletas, enlatados, sopas, producto de limpieza para el hogar, cosméticos. Esto le ayudara a mantener surtida su pulpería para que sus clientes encuentren de todo y así ir mejorando sus ventas.  Pues desea establecer otros puntos de ventas para dar a conocer su negocio.
texts.en:
Darling, is a young entrepreneur, 22 years old, a native of Estelí, and married. For the last three years she has owned a grocery store. She started this business by selling chicken, but her clients asked her to sell other groceries as well, so little by little she introduced basic grains and cleaning products. Her husband, who works  as a teacher in the town's Ministry of Education, supported her at the beginning by giving her a small amount of money to buy goods. This is the first business that Darling has had, and it is growing little by little.

She is taking out a loan to buy rice, sugar, beans, juice, cookies, canned goods,  soups, household cleaning products and cosmetics. This will help her to maintain a varied stock in her grocery store so that her customers find everything they need, thus improving her sales. Darling would like to set up other sales locations to make her business better known.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, beans, juice, cookies, canned goods,  soups, household cleaning products and cosmetics.

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.es:
Zenaida de 31 años de edad, es viuda pero tiene 2 hijos, pedro de 11, y jazmín de 2 añitos de edad. Juntos habitan en su propia casa, ubicada en el centro poblado de Canayre del distrito de LLochegua. 
Desde muy joven, Zenaida se ha dedicado a las labores agrícolas, hace un año perdió a su querido esposo a causa de una enfermedad, es así que desde entonces tuvo que hacerse cargo de los quehaceres del campo juntamente con 2 peones quienes le facilitan en las faenas diarias. Por otro lado posee un campo campestre donde expende platos típicos de la región a base de pescado. Zenaida esta orgullosa por lo que hasta ahora viene logrando gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación constante. En un futuro desea ampliar su campro recreacional, ya que con lo poco que tiene no llega a satisfacer al cliente. Este será su cuarto credito con MFP, por lo que se compromete otra vez más en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 2,500 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la ampliación de su centro recreacional campestre.
texts.en:
Zenaida, 31, is a widow with two children, Pedro, 11, and Jazmín, 2.  They live in their own house in the the center of the village of Canayre in the district of Llochegua.

From a very early age Zenaida has worked in agriculture.  A year ago she lost her beloved husband due to illness so she had to take over managing the field with two workers who take care of the daily work.  She also has a rural center where she sells regional dishes made with fish.  Zenaida is proud of what she has been able to accomplish thanks to her hard work and constant dedication.  

In the future she would like to expand her recreational center since she does not quite have everything customers demand.  This is her fourth loan through MFP and she is committed to paying it back on time.  The 2,500 PEN loan will be used to expand the rural recreational center.

loans.use: To expand her rural recreational center.

loans.name: Rodrigo Eduardo

texts.es:
Rodrigo Eduardo tiene  27 años de estado civil casado, vive con su esposa, y con sus hijos de 4,1 año de edad viven en el Cantón Chillanes provincia  de Bolívar.

La ventanilla LUZ Y PROGRESO se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Josè de Guayabal, perteneciente al cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de  mora.

Rodrigo Eduardo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de mora. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en chillanes.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, abono, urea, líquidos  fertilizantes para la siembra de la mora. 

El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el beneficio de la familia y para invertir. El sueño es incrementar los sombríos de mora para tener mejores ingresos y así un mejor estilo de vida.
Le gusta jugar volé  y  que llegue el carnaval.
texts.en:
Rodrigo Eduardo is 27 years old and married. He lives with his wife and their two children, aged 4 and 1, in the canton of Chillanes in the province of Bolívar. The branch "Luz y Progreso" ("light and progress") of his communal bank is located in the municipality of San José de Guayabal, belonging to the canton of Chillanes. This branch provides loans for short-term agricultural activities, such as sowing blackberries.

Rodrigo Eduardo is a farmer who grows blackberries. He buys and sells his products in Chillanes.

He applies for the loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, urea and liquid fertilizer to grow blackberries. The loan helps him to increase his income for the benefit of his family and to invest in his business. His dream is to increase his crop of blackberries in order to earn more money and thus have a better living standard.

He likes playing volleyball and going to the carnival festivities.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, urea and liquid fertilizer to grow blackberries.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es: El señor Antonio es una  persona  emprendedora  y  muy responsable,  el  cual  se a  dedicado   durante  ya  varios años   a la venta  de  elotes,  la cual realiza  por  las  calles  de  la localidad y ya  cuenta  con   sus clientes  frecuentes, el  esta  muy   feliz  de   habernos  encontrado  ya  que  realizara  su  proyecto,el cual  consiste   en   construir   un cuarto que  acondicionara   como local  para  continuar  ofreciendo su  servicio, agradece  el apoyo  brindado para  hacer realidad  su sueño  ya  que  ve  en  el crédito  la  posibilidad  de  aumentar  su   numero de   clientes, esto    permitiéndole   generar  un mayor  numero de  ingresos  y  a  su  vez  seguir   brindado a sus  clientes  el excelente  servicio  que  lo a caracterizado.
texts.en: Mr. Antonio is an enterprising, responsible person who has been selling corn for several years.  He works as a street vendor in his town and has many frequent customers.  He is glad to have found us because he will be able to carry out his project, which is building a room that he will fix up as a sales point to continue his business.  He is grateful for the support in realizing his dream since he believes the loan will make it possible for him to increase his customer base and generate more income.  This will allow him to continue providing the excellent customer service that he is known for.

loans.use: To build a room to fix up as a sales point.

loans.name: Basilia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN COPACABANA DE OLLANTAYTAMBO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Basilia; ella tiene 40 años de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche, galletas y aceites, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es ampliar la tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos como arroz, azúcar, leche y galletas al por mayor. 
    
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "VIRGEN COPACABANA DE OLLANTAYTAMBO", which is located in the district of Ollantaytambo and belongs to the province of Urubamba and department of Cusco.

She is Mrs. Basilia, 40, who is married and has four children.  She alternates her daily activities with her grocery store business.  She sells essential goods such as rice, sugar, milk, cookies and oils.  Her work hours are from 6:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. and through her business she has been able to provide for her children.  Her dream is to expand her store.  She is requesting a loan to buy products such as rice, sugar, milk and cookies, wholesale.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy products such as rice, sugar, milk and cookies, wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 20 pigs.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La señora Francisca de 61 años de edad, vive en Yalaguina municipio de Estelí, es comerciante tiene una Pulpería, tiene tres hijos los cuales ya son mayores de edad y son independientes. El capital con que comenzó su negocio fue gracias a la venta de 2 vacas que su padre le heredo. Fue comprando producto poco a poco así mismo fue creciendo su clientela, con este negocio mantuvo su hogar y la educación de sus tres hijos. Sus clientes fijos a diario la visitan son los pequeños beisbolistas ya que se encuentra cerca de uno de los estadios de Beisbol.     
Ella realizo el crédito para compra de productos tales como jabones, detergentes, granos básicos, pan , jugos, agua embotellada, gaseosas galletas, leche, huevo. Pues son alimentos que sus clientela busca a diario y que muchas veces se vuelven escasos en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Francisca, age 61, lives in Yalaguina in the Estelí municipality.  She is a merchant, and she has a grocery store.  She has three children who are  independent adults.

The money used to start the business was thanks to the sale of two cows that her father bequeathed her.  Little by little she bought products, and her clientele was growing.  With this business she supported her household and paid for the education of her three children.  Fixed customers visit the store daily.  They are young baseball players because her business is close to one of the baseball stadiums.
